													<script data-name="featured-video-mapped-to-wiki">
	(function () {
		// we can't use mw.config here because it's too early so we need to pass this data in different way
		const videoDetails = {
			mapping: {"mediaId":"CR0MZ2ZP","connatixPlaylistId":"740e6aed-8e71-4c87-842f-45398734be12","impressionsPerSession":4},
			impressionsPerSession: 4,
		};
		const videoBridgeCountries = ["AE","AG","AL","AM","AR","AT","AU","AZ","BA","BB","BD","BG","BH","BN","BO","BR","BS","BY","CA","CH","CL","CN","CO","CR","CU","CY","CZ","DE","DK","DO","DZ","EC","EE","EG","ES","FI","FR","GB","GE","GF","GG","GH","GP","GR","GT","GU","GY","HK","HN","HR","HU","ID","IE","IL","IM","IN","IQ","IR","IS","IT","JE","JM","JO","JP","KE","KG","KH","KR","KW","KY","KZ","LA","LB","LK","LT","LU","LV","LY","MA","MD","ME","MK","MM","MN","MO","MQ","MT","MU","MV","MX","MY","NG","NI","NL","NO","NP","NZ","OM","PA","PE","PH","PK","PL","PR","PS","PT","PY","QA","RE","RO","RS","RU","SA","SC","SE","SG","SI","SK","SV","TD","TH","TN","TR","TT","TW","UA","US","UY","UZ","VE","VI","VN","ZA","ZW"];
		const tier3VideoBridgeCountries = ["GB","BE","NL","DE","AU","MX","AR","FR","MD","CA","ES","IE","IT","PE","CO","CL","NZ"];
		let hasVideoOnPage = null;

		function getCookieValue(cookieName) {
			const cookieSplit = ('; ' + document.cookie).split('; ' + cookieName + '=');
			return cookieSplit.length === 2 ? cookieSplit.pop().split(';').shift() : null;
		}

		function hasMaxedOutPlayerImpressionsInWiki() {
			const impressionsSoFar = Number(getCookieValue('playerImpressionsInWiki')) || 0;
			const allowedImpressions = Number(videoDetails.impressionsPerSession);

			return impressionsSoFar >= allowedImpressions;
		}

		function getCountryCode() {
			try {
				return JSON.parse(decodeURIComponent(getCookieValue('Geo'))).country.toLowerCase();
			} catch {
				return null;
			}
		}

		function isVideoBridgeAllowedForCountry() {
			const countryCode = getCountryCode();

			if (!countryCode) {
				return false;
			}

			// If it's a default mapping, then check the country whitelist from the default mapping.
			if (videoDetails?.mapping?.isDefaultMapping) {
				// If the wiki is classified as a tier3 wiki, then check the country whitelist from the tier3VideoBridge whitelist.
				const allowedCountriesForTier3Wikis = tier3VideoBridgeCountries.map(function (allowedTier3CountryCode) {
					return allowedTier3CountryCode.toLowerCase();
				})

				return allowedCountriesForTier3Wikis.indexOf(countryCode) !== -1;
			} else {
				// If not a default mapping wiki (so it's a wiki mapping), then check the country whitelist from the videoBridge whitelist
				const allowedCountries = videoBridgeCountries.map(function (allowedCountryCode) {
					return allowedCountryCode.toLowerCase();
				});

				return allowedCountries.indexOf(countryCode) !== -1;
			}
		}

		window.fandomIsVideoPossible = function () {
			if (hasVideoOnPage === null) {
				hasVideoOnPage =
					videoDetails.mapping &&
					isVideoBridgeAllowedForCountry() &&
					!hasMaxedOutPlayerImpressionsInWiki();
			}

			return hasVideoOnPage;
		};

		window.canPlayVideo = function () {
			return window.fandomIsVideoPossible()
		};

		if (!window.canPlayVideo()) {
			document.body.classList.add('no-featured-video');
		} else {
			document.body.classList.add('has-featured-video');
		}
	})();
</script>

</p>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone">"<i>I'm the sixth in our family to go to Hogwarts. You could say I got a lot to live up to. Bill and Charlie have already left — Bill was Head Boy and Charlie was captain of Quidditch. Now Percy's a prefect. Fred and George mess around a lot, but they still get really good marks and everyone thinks they're really funny. Everyone expects me to do as well as the others, but if I do, it's no big deal, because they did it first.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Ron's family and others' expectations<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p><b>Auror Ronald Bilius</b><sup id="cite_ref-30" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-30"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>30<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><b> "Ron" Weasley</b> (b. <a href="/wiki/1_March" title="1 March">1 March</a> <a href="/wiki/1980" title="1980">1980</a>) was an <a href="/wiki/England" title="England">English</a> <a href="/wiki/Pure-blood" title="Pure-blood">pure-blood</a><sup id="cite_ref-blood_2-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-blood-2"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>2<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-pure-blood_3-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-pure-blood-3"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>3<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> <a href="/wiki/Wizardkind" title="Wizardkind">wizard</a>, the sixth and youngest son of <a href="/wiki/Arthur_Weasley" title="Arthur Weasley">Arthur</a> and <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Molly Weasley</a> <span class="template-c">(née <a href="/wiki/Prewett_family" title="Prewett family">Prewett</a>)</span>. He was also the younger brother of <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill</a>, <a href="/wiki/Charles_Weasley" title="Charles Weasley">Charlie</a>, <a href="/wiki/Percy_Weasley" title="Percy Weasley">Percy</a>, <a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley" title="Fred Weasley">Fred</a>, <a href="/wiki/George_Weasley" title="George Weasley">George</a>, and the elder brother of <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny</a>. Ron and his siblings lived at <a href="/wiki/The_Burrow" title="The Burrow">The Burrow</a>, on the outskirts of <a href="/wiki/Ottery_St_Catchpole" title="Ottery St Catchpole">Ottery St Catchpole</a>, <a href="/wiki/Devon" title="Devon">Devon</a>.
</p><p>Ron began attending <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry</a> in <a href="/wiki/1991" title="1991">1991</a> and was Sorted into <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor House</a>. He soon became close friends with fellow student <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a> and later <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a>. Together, they made the <a href="/wiki/Trio" title="Trio">Golden Trio</a> and faced many challenges during their adolescence, including keeping the <a href="/wiki/Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Philosopher's Stone">Philosopher's Stone</a> from Professor <a href="/wiki/Quirinus_Quirrell" title="Quirinus Quirrell">Quirinus Quirrell</a>, rescuing Ginny from the <a href="/wiki/Serpent_of_Slytherin" title="Serpent of Slytherin">Basilisk</a> in the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a>, saving Harry's godfather <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a> from the <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a> of <a href="/wiki/Azkaban" title="Azkaban">Azkaban</a>, and later supporting Harry during the <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Tournament" title="Triwizard Tournament">Triwizard Tournament</a>.
</p><p>He also helped form <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore's Army">Dumbledore's Army</a> and fought in numerous battles of the <a href="/wiki/Second_Wizarding_War" title="Second Wizarding War">Second Wizarding War</a>. These battles included the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Department_of_Mysteries" title="Battle of the Department of Mysteries">Battle of the Department of Mysteries</a> (<a href="/wiki/1996" title="1996">1996</a>), <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Astronomy_Tower" title="Battle of the Astronomy Tower">Battle of the Astronomy Tower</a> (<a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a>), and <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters" title="Battle of the Seven Potters">Battle of the Seven Potters</a> (1997). Ron also became a Gryffindor <a href="/wiki/Prefect" title="Prefect">prefect</a> and a <a href="/wiki/Keeper" title="Keeper">Keeper</a> on the <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor_Quidditch_team" title="Gryffindor Quidditch team">Gryffindor Quidditch team</a> during his fifth year at Hogwarts.
</p><p>He left Hogwarts before completing his final year in order to accompany Harry and Hermione on a <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore_and_Harry_Potter%27s_Horcrux_hunt" title="Albus Dumbledore and Harry Potter's Horcrux hunt">hunt</a> to destroy all of <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a>'s <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a> and fought in the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a> in <a href="/wiki/1998" title="1998">1998</a>, during which he lost his brother Fred, a loss which devastated him and his family, especially George, Fred's twin.
</p><p>After the war, Ron became an <a href="/wiki/Auror" title="Auror">Auror</a> and helped reform and revolutionise the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">British Ministry of Magic</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-PotterCast_31-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PotterCast-31"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>31<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> After two years as an Auror, he worked at <a href="/wiki/Weasleys%27_Wizard_Wheezes" title="Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes">Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes</a> with George to help keep the business thriving after Fred’s death. He and Hermione eventually married and had two children, <a href="/wiki/Rose_Granger-Weasley" title="Rose Granger-Weasley">Rose</a> and <a href="/wiki/Hugo_Granger-Weasley" title="Hugo Granger-Weasley">Hugo Granger-Weasley</a>. Ron was also named the godfather of <a href="/wiki/James_Potter_(II)" title="James Potter (II)">James Sirius Potter</a>, his sister Ginny Weasley's and Harry Potter's eldest child.
</p>

			<h3 class="trfc161__header-text">Quick Answers</h3>
		</div>
		<img class="trfc161-logo" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/8941553e-df6a-4310-a080-b9da56fdcbdd" alt="fandom logo">

	<div class="trfc161__groups">
			<details class="trfc161__group " data-question-id="1222" data-revision-id="3">
				<summary class="trfc161__question-wrapper">
					<b class="trfc161__question">What is the full name of Ron Weasley?</b>
						<img class="trfc161__question-chevron" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/835ea5d8-5dd9-4dc6-83dc-8554b30552d7" alt="toggle section">
				</summary>
				<div class="trfc161__answer">
					<div class="quick-answers__answer-text">
						The full name of Ron from Harry Potter is Ronald Bilius Weasley.
					</div>
					<div class="trfc161__answer-source">
						Provided by: Community
					</div>
					<div class="quick_answers__report-module-root" data-reportable="1"></div>
				</div>
			</details>
			<details class="trfc161__group " data-question-id="1223" data-revision-id="3">
				<summary class="trfc161__question-wrapper">
					<b class="trfc161__question">What is the birth date of Ronald Weasley?</b>
						<img class="trfc161__question-chevron" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/835ea5d8-5dd9-4dc6-83dc-8554b30552d7" alt="toggle section">
				</summary>
				<div class="trfc161__answer">
					<div class="quick-answers__answer-text">
						Ronald Weasley was born on 1 March 1980. 
					</div>
					<div class="trfc161__answer-source">
						Provided by: Community
					</div>
					<div class="quick_answers__report-module-root" data-reportable="1"></div>
				</div>
			</details>
			<details class="trfc161__group " data-question-id="1224" data-revision-id="3">
				<summary class="trfc161__question-wrapper">
					<b class="trfc161__question">How many siblings does Ron Weasley have?</b>
						<img class="trfc161__question-chevron" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/835ea5d8-5dd9-4dc6-83dc-8554b30552d7" alt="toggle section">
				</summary>
				<div class="trfc161__answer">
					<div class="quick-answers__answer-text">
						Ron Weasley has six siblings. He is the younger brother of Bill, Charlie, Percy, Fred, and George, and the elder brother of Ginny. This makes him the sixth son of Arthur and Molly Weasley.
					</div>
					<div class="trfc161__answer-source">
						Provided by: Community
					</div>
					<div class="quick_answers__report-module-root" data-reportable="1"></div>
				</div>
			</details>
			<details class="trfc161__group " data-question-id="1225" data-revision-id="1">
				<summary class="trfc161__question-wrapper">
					<b class="trfc161__question">How old is Ron Weasley in the first Harry Potter book?</b>
						<img class="trfc161__question-chevron" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/835ea5d8-5dd9-4dc6-83dc-8554b30552d7" alt="toggle section">
				</summary>
				<div class="trfc161__answer">
					<div class="quick-answers__answer-text">
						In the first Harry Potter book, 'Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone', Ron Weasley is 11 years old. This is the age when witches and wizards in the Harry Potter universe typically start their education at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
					</div>
					<div class="trfc161__answer-source">
						Provided by: Fandom
					</div>
					<div class="quick_answers__report-module-root" data-reportable="1"></div>
				</div>
			</details>
			<details class="trfc161__group " data-question-id="1226" data-revision-id="2">
				<summary class="trfc161__question-wrapper">
					<b class="trfc161__question">What expectations did Ron feel from his family?</b>
						<img class="trfc161__question-chevron" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/835ea5d8-5dd9-4dc6-83dc-8554b30552d7" alt="toggle section">
				</summary>
				<div class="trfc161__answer">
					<div class="quick-answers__answer-text">
						Ron often felt the weight of his family's expectations. Being the sixth son in the Weasley family, he was expected to match or even surpass the achievements of his older siblings. His brothers Bill and Charlie had set high standards, with Bill being a Head Boy and Charlie being the captain of Quidditch. Even his twin brothers, Fred and George, despite their notorious pranks, were academically successful and popular. So, everyone expected Ron to do as well as the others. However, he felt that even if he did meet these expectations, it wouldn't be a big deal because his siblings had already achieved those milestones.
					</div>
					<div class="trfc161__answer-source">
						Provided by: Community
					</div>
					<div class="quick_answers__report-module-root" data-reportable="1"></div>
				</div>
			</details>
	</div>
</section>

<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Biography">Biography</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<h3><span id="Early_life_.281980.E2.80.931991.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Early_life_(1980–1991)">Early life <span class="template-c">(1980–1991)</span></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>Fred and George tried to get me to make one when I was about five. I nearly did, too, I was holding hands with Fred and everything when Dad found us. He went mental. Only time I've ever seen Dad as angry as Mum. Fred reckons his left buttock has never been the same since!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Ron on his brothers' attempt to get him to make an <a href="/wiki/Unbreakable_Vow" title="Unbreakable Vow">Unbreakable Vow</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>Ronald Bilius Weasley was born <a href="/wiki/1_March" title="1 March">1 March</a> <a href="/wiki/1980" title="1980">1980</a>, to <a href="/wiki/Arthur_Weasley" title="Arthur Weasley">Arthur</a> and <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Molly Weasley</a> (née <a href="/wiki/Prewett_family" title="Prewett family">Prewett</a>),<sup id="cite_ref-PS_12-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-12"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>12<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> at the height of the <a href="/wiki/First_Wizarding_War" title="First Wizarding War">First Wizarding War</a>. During this war his maternal uncles <a href="/wiki/Fabian_Prewett" title="Fabian Prewett">Fabian</a> and <a href="/wiki/Gideon_Prewett" title="Gideon Prewett">Gideon Prewett</a>, both members of the <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a>, were murdered while fighting a group of four <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> led by <a href="/wiki/Antonin_Dolohov" title="Antonin Dolohov">Antonin Dolohov</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_6-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-6"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>6<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> While he was still a toddler, the war ended for a time after <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a>'s first defeat at the hands of Ron's classmate-to-be <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a> on the <a href="/wiki/31_October" title="31 October">31 October</a> <a href="/wiki/1981" title="1981">1981</a>.
</p><p>Ron and his five older brothers — <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill</a>, <a href="/wiki/Charles_Weasley" title="Charles Weasley">Charlie</a>, <a href="/wiki/Percy_Weasley" title="Percy Weasley">Percy</a>, <a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley" title="Fred Weasley">Fred</a> and <a href="/wiki/George_Weasley" title="George Weasley">George</a> — as well as his younger sister, <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny</a>, grew up in <a href="/wiki/The_Burrow" title="The Burrow">The Burrow</a> on the outskirts of <a href="/wiki/Ottery_St_Catchpole" title="Ottery St Catchpole">Ottery St Catchpole</a> in <a href="/wiki/Devon" title="Devon">Devon</a>, <a href="/wiki/England" title="England">England</a>. Like all his siblings, he was home educated in reading, writing and simple mathematics by his mother. The <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family" title="Weasley family">Weasley family</a> was not wealthy at all, compared to other wizarding families.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_32-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Many other <a href="/wiki/Pure-blood" title="Pure-blood">pure-blood</a> families, particularly the <a href="/wiki/Malfoy_family" title="Malfoy family">Malfoys</a>, disdained them for their "<i><a href="/wiki/Blood_traitor" title="Blood traitor">blood traitor</a></i>" beliefs and lack of wealth. They tried their best to make up for this with their <a href="/wiki/Love" title="Love">love</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-CS_33-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-CS-33"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>33<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>The Weasley siblings, especially Fred and George, were fond of teasing and playing pranks on each other, and Ron was a particular target for Fred and George. They once <a href="/wiki/Transfiguration" title="Transfiguration">Transfigured</a> Ron's teddy bear into a giant spider, sparking his arachnophobia. On another occasion, the twins nearly got him to make an Unbreakable Vow, which finally made their father truly furious (and Fred would later state that his left buttock has "<i>never been the same since</i>" after the row that ensued). They also once got him to eat an <a href="/wiki/Acid_Pops" title="Acid Pops">Acid Pop</a> which burnt a hole through his tongue.
</p><p>When Ron was younger, he had a pet rat named Scabbers, whom he had inherited from Percy. This rat was actually <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">Peter Pettigrew</a>, an informant and Voldemort's servant who betrayed Harry's parents. Ron was very fond of Scabbers, but wasn't sad to let him go when he found out the truth about his old rat.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_32-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-FB_34-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-FB-34"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>34<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Ron had a fairly happy childhood, which Harry envied, having been brought up by his spiteful relatives, the <a href="/wiki/Dursley_family" title="Dursley family">Dursley family</a>. To compensate for their impoverishment, Ron's mother indulged him in three delicious meals daily. This became so habitual that missing a meal in later life would irritate Ron.
</p>
<h3><span id="Hogwarts_years_.281991.E2.80.931997.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Hogwarts_years_(1991–1997)">Hogwarts years <span class="template-c">(1991–1997)</span></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="First_year">First year</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Meeting_Harry_and_Hermione">Meeting Harry and Hermione</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone"><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>Are you sure that's a real spell? Well, it's not very good, is it? I've tried a few simple spells just for practice and it's all worked for me. Nobody in my family's magic at all, it was ever such a surprise when I got my letter, but I was ever so pleased, of course, I mean, it's the very best school of witchcraft there is, I've heard — I've learned all our course books by heart, of course, I just hope it will be enough — I'm Hermione Granger, by the way, who are you?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Ron</b>: "<i>I'm Ron Weasley.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>Harry Potter</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Ron and Harry introducing themselves to Hermione on the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Express" title="Hogwarts Express">Hogwarts Express</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/46/Trio_meet.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160215161419" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Trio meet" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="113" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Trio meet.jpg" data-image-key="Trio_meet.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/46/Trio_meet.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160215161419"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/46/Trio_meet.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160215161419" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Trio meet" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/46/Trio_meet.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160215161419" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="113" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Trio meet.jpg" data-image-key="Trio_meet.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/46/Trio_meet.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160215161419"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Trio_meet.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The <a href="/wiki/Trio" title="Trio">trio</a> meeting for the first time on the Hogwarts Express</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Ron began to attend <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry</a> in <a href="/wiki/1991" title="1991">1991</a> at the customary age of eleven. He was Sorted into Gryffindor House, like every other Weasley. On his first trip on the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Express" title="Hogwarts Express">Hogwarts Express</a>, Ron met and became friends with the famous wizard <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a>. Harry let him share his carriage on the Hogwarts Express and purchased a large amount of wizarding snacks from the Hogwarts Express <a href="/wiki/Honeydukes_Express" title="Honeydukes Express">food trolley</a> to share with him. Later on, Harry would stand up for Ron against <a href="/wiki/Slytherin" title="Slytherin">Slytherin</a> bully Draco Malfoy and Ron would elect to be his second for a midnight duel.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_12-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-12"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>12<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/90/Ron_And_The_Sorting_Hat.png/revision/latest?cb=20180607053436" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ron And The Sorting Hat" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Ron And The Sorting Hat.png" data-image-key="Ron_And_The_Sorting_Hat.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/90/Ron_And_The_Sorting_Hat.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180607053436"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/90/Ron_And_The_Sorting_Hat.png/revision/latest?cb=20180607053436" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ron And The Sorting Hat" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/90/Ron_And_The_Sorting_Hat.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180607053436" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Ron And The Sorting Hat.png" data-image-key="Ron_And_The_Sorting_Hat.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/90/Ron_And_The_Sorting_Hat.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180607053436"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Ron_And_The_Sorting_Hat.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron being <a href="/wiki/Sorting_Ceremony" title="Sorting Ceremony">sorted</a> into <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a> by the <a href="/wiki/Sorting_Hat" title="Sorting Hat">Sorting Hat</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Ron and Harry first met <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a> on the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Express" title="Hogwarts Express">train</a> but Ron did not particularly take to her. Ron, especially, was annoyed by what he saw as Hermione showing off her knowledge of <a href="/wiki/Magic" title="Magic">magic</a>, such as when she corrected him on the pronunciation of the incantation <i><a href="/wiki/Levitation_Charm" title="Levitation Charm">Wingardium Leviosa</a></i>.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_12-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-12"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>12<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span id="Hallowe.27en"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Hallowe'en">Hallowe'en</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone">"<i>There are some things you can't share without ending up liking each other, and knocking out a twelve-foot mountain troll is one of them.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— The creation of the trio's special friendship<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/15/Troll_knocked_out_PSF.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170719034426" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Troll knocked out PSF" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="99" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Troll knocked out PSF.jpg" data-image-key="Troll_knocked_out_PSF.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/15/Troll_knocked_out_PSF.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170719034426"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/15/Troll_knocked_out_PSF.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170719034426" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Troll knocked out PSF" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/15/Troll_knocked_out_PSF.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170719034426" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="99" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Troll knocked out PSF.jpg" data-image-key="Troll_knocked_out_PSF.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/15/Troll_knocked_out_PSF.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170719034426"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Troll_knocked_out_PSF.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron and Harry after having defeated a fully grown Mountain Troll</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Prior to the <a href="/wiki/Hallowe%27en_feast" title="Hallowe'en feast">Hallowe'en feast</a>, Ron angrily declared that Hermione was a know-it-all and did not have any friends. Hermione overheard his outburst and went running to the girl's bathroom in tears. That evening, during the Hallowe'en feast, it was announced that a <a href="/wiki/Troll_in_the_Bathroom" title="Troll in the Bathroom">mountain troll</a> was loose in the school. Ron and Harry came to Hermione's rescue after hearing that she was in trouble, with Ron successfully using the <a href="/wiki/Levitation_Charm" title="Levitation Charm">Levitation Charm</a> to <a href="/wiki/Levitation" title="Levitation">levitate</a> the <a href="/wiki/Troll" title="Troll">troll</a>'s club and drop it on its head, knocking it out. She, in return, lied to protect them from Professor McGonagall. The three then became very close friends.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_12-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-12"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>12<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span id="Protecting_the_Philosopher.27s_Stone"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Protecting_the_Philosopher's_Stone">Protecting the Philosopher's Stone</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone">"<i>I have a few last-minute points to dish out. Let me see. First — to Mr Ronald Weasley... for the best-played game of <a href="/wiki/Wizard%27s_Chess" title="Wizard's Chess">chess</a> Hogwarts has seen in many years, I award Gryffindor house fifty points.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Ron being awarded for winning the human chess match<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/Ron_sacrifice.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140718155046" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ron sacrifice" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="120" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Ron sacrifice.gif" data-image-key="Ron_sacrifice.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/Ron_sacrifice.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140718155046"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/Ron_sacrifice.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140718155046" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ron sacrifice" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/Ron_sacrifice.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140718155046" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="120" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Ron sacrifice.gif" data-image-key="Ron_sacrifice.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/Ron_sacrifice.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140718155046"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Ron_sacrifice.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron sacrificing himself in the chess game in the <a href="/wiki/Underground_Chambers#Sixth" title="Underground Chambers">Philosopher's Stone Chambers</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>During their <a href="/wiki/First_year" title="First year">first year</a>, the three of them learnt that the <a href="/wiki/Philosopher%27s_Stone" title="Philosopher's Stone">Philosopher's Stone</a> was being hidden in Hogwarts and sought to protect it from being stolen by Severus Snape, whom the young wizards believed to be working for <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a>. Ron's talent in <a href="/wiki/Wizard%27s_Chess" title="Wizard's Chess">Wizard's Chess</a> allowed them to pass one of the obstacles protecting the stone, which was a life-sized game. Ron sacrificed himself as a game piece so Harry could place the enemy king in checkmate, allowing Harry and Hermione to move on.
</p><p>Ultimately, it was discovered that Professor Quirrell was trying to steal the stone for Voldemort. Harry succeeded in defeating him and protecting the Philosopher's Stone, and Ron was awarded fifty <a href="/wiki/House_points" title="House points">House points</a> by <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a> for "<i>the best played game of chess that Hogwarts has seen these many years</i>", allowing Gryffindor to win the <a href="/wiki/House_Cup" title="House Cup">House Cup</a> for the first time in seven years.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_12-7" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-12"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>12<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Second_year">Second year</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Flying_the_Ford_Anglia">Flying the Ford Anglia</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">"<i>LETTER FROM DUMBLEDORE LAST NIGHT, I THOUGHT YOUR FATHER WOULD DIE OF SHAME, WE DIDN'T BRING YOU UP TO BEHAVE LIKE THIS, YOU AND HARRY COULD BOTH HAVE DIED —ABSOLUTELY DISGUSTED — YOUR FATHER'S FACING AN INQUIRY AT WORK, IT'S ENTIRELY YOUR FAULT AND IF YOU PUT ANOTHER TOE OUT OF LINE WE'LL BRING YOU STRAIGHT BACK HOME.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Molly Weasley's nasty howler<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/ad/Harry-potter2-flying_car.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170718070817" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter2-flying car" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter2-flying car.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter2-flying_car.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/ad/Harry-potter2-flying_car.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170718070817"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/ad/Harry-potter2-flying_car.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170718070817" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter2-flying car" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/ad/Harry-potter2-flying_car.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170718070817" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter2-flying car.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter2-flying_car.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/ad/Harry-potter2-flying_car.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170718070817"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter2-flying_car.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron and Harry flying a car to school in their <a href="/wiki/Second_year" title="Second year">second year</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Having not heard from <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a> during the whole summer of <a href="/wiki/1992" title="1992">1992</a>, Ron, Fred and George Weasley, in a planned scheme to rescue him from <a href="/wiki/4_Privet_Drive" title="4 Privet Drive">4 Privet Drive</a>, drove Arthur Weasley's <a href="/wiki/Flying_Ford_Anglia" title="Flying Ford Anglia">flying Ford Anglia</a> to the <a href="/wiki/Non-magic_people" title="Non-magic people">Muggle</a> town of <a href="/wiki/Little_Whinging" title="Little Whinging">Little Whinging</a> and tore the bars from Harry's bedroom window using the car's horsepower. Ron and the twins helped Harry get his things in the car, and they left for the <a href="/wiki/The_Burrow" title="The Burrow">Weasley House</a>. Upon landing Ron and his brothers were ratted out by Molly Weasley for having taken such a risky course of action.
</p><p>At the start of that year's school term, Ron and Harry missed the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Express" title="Hogwarts Express">Hogwarts Express</a> due to the tricks of <a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a> the house-elf and were forced to use the Ford Anglia to travel to Hogwarts. At the end of their journey, the car failed, causing the boys to crash-land into the Whomping Willow. They were nearly killed when the tree shook, and the car jettisoned them and took off into the <a href="/wiki/Forbidden_Forest" title="Forbidden Forest">Forbidden Forest</a>, where it remained.<sup id="cite_ref-CS_33-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-CS-33"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>33<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Attempt_to_curse_Malfoy">Attempt to curse Malfoy</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets"><b>Draco Malfoy</b>: "<i>No one asked your opinion, you filthy little Mudblood.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Ron</b>: "<i>You'll pay for that one, Malfoy!</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Ron attempting to curse Malfoy, but ending up vomiting slugs<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/ba/B2C8M2_Writing_on_the_Wall.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170831193739" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B2C8M2 Writing on the Wall" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B2C8M2 Writing on the Wall.jpg" data-image-key="B2C8M2_Writing_on_the_Wall.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/ba/B2C8M2_Writing_on_the_Wall.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170831193739"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/ba/B2C8M2_Writing_on_the_Wall.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170831193739" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B2C8M2 Writing on the Wall" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/ba/B2C8M2_Writing_on_the_Wall.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170831193739" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B2C8M2 Writing on the Wall.jpg" data-image-key="B2C8M2_Writing_on_the_Wall.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/ba/B2C8M2_Writing_on_the_Wall.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170831193739"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B2C8M2_Writing_on_the_Wall.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The writing on the wall and the petrified form of <a href="/wiki/Mrs_Norris" title="Mrs Norris">Mrs Norris</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p><a href="/wiki/Charles_Weasley%27s_wand" title="Charles Weasley's wand">Ron's wand</a> was damaged in the crash, causing him problems for the entire school year. It backfired when Ron attempted to <a href="/wiki/Curse" title="Curse">curse</a> <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a> in payback for calling Hermione a "<a href="/wiki/Mudblood" title="Mudblood">Mudblood</a>" with the <a href="/wiki/Slug-vomiting_Charm" title="Slug-vomiting Charm">Slug-vomiting Charm</a>, resulting with him <a href="/wiki/Vomit" title="Vomit">vomiting</a> <a href="/wiki/Slug" title="Slug">slugs</a> and slime.
</p><p>Malfoy's disdain towards <a href="/wiki/Muggle-born" title="Muggle-born">Muggle-borns</a> led Ron, Harry, and Hermione to suspect that he was the <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Heir of Slytherin</a> who opened the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a> that year, unleashing a "<a href="/wiki/Serpent_of_Slytherin" title="Serpent of Slytherin">monster</a>" that began to attack Muggle-born students.<sup id="cite_ref-CS_33-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-CS-33"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>33<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Impersonating_Crabbe">Impersonating Crabbe</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">"<i>Ron’s door opened. They stared at each other. Except that he looked pale and shocked, Ron was indistinguishable from Crabbe, from the pudding-bowl haircut to the long, gorilla arms.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Ron disguised as Vincent Crabbe via Polyjuice<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e0/Polyjuice_potion.jpeg/revision/latest?cb=20250921233630" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Polyjuice potion" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Polyjuice potion.jpeg" data-image-key="Polyjuice_potion.jpeg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e0/Polyjuice_potion.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20250921233630"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e0/Polyjuice_potion.jpeg/revision/latest?cb=20250921233630" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Polyjuice potion" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e0/Polyjuice_potion.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20250921233630" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Polyjuice potion.jpeg" data-image-key="Polyjuice_potion.jpeg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e0/Polyjuice_potion.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20250921233630"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Polyjuice_potion.jpeg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio preparing to take <a href="/wiki/Polyjuice_Potion" title="Polyjuice Potion">Polyjuice Potion</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>To investigate this theory, Hermione brewed a Polyjuice Potion which greatly surprised Ron in that she was so overtly breaking the rules. When the time came to use the potion, Ron was made to impersonate <a href="/wiki/Vincent_Crabbe" title="Vincent Crabbe">Vincent Crabbe</a>, and Harry impersonated <a href="/wiki/Gregory_Goyle" title="Gregory Goyle">Gregory Goyle</a>, while Hermione's transformation was unsuccessful because she mistook hair from <a href="/wiki/Millicent_Bulstrode" title="Millicent Bulstrode">Millicent Bulstrode</a>'s <a href="/wiki/Millicent_Bulstrode%27s_cat" title="Millicent Bulstrode's cat">cat</a> for her own.
</p><p>Ron and Harry interrogated Malfoy in the Slytherin Common Room, during which Malfoy proceeded to insult both Dumbledore and Harry. He also made a callous comment about Hermione, hoping that she would be the Muggle-born victim that dies during the attacks. "<i>But I know one thing: last time the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a> was opened, a Mudblood died. So I bet it’s only a matter of time before one of them’s killed this time… I hope it’s Granger</i>".<sup id="cite_ref-35" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-35"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>35<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> This comment upset both Ron and Harry, but they were able to maintain their cover and eventually realised that Malfoy was not the Heir of Slytherin.<sup id="cite_ref-CS_33-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-CS-33"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>33<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> In fact, Malfoy had no idea who was behind the attacks.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Return_to_the_Forbidden_Forest">Return to the Forbidden Forest</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets"><b>Ron</b>: "<i>Follow the spiders. I'll never forgive Hagrid. We're lucky to be alive.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>I bet he thought Aragog wouldn't hurt friends of his.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Ron</b>: "<i>That’s exactly Hagrid's problem! He always thinks monsters aren't as bad as they're made out, and look where it's got him! A cell in Azkaban!</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Ron and Harry having entered the <a href="/wiki/Forbidden_Forest" title="Forbidden Forest">Forbidden Forest</a> and spoken to <a href="/wiki/Aragog" title="Aragog">Aragog</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9d/Harry-potter2-movie-spider_aragog.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190819144011" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter2-movie-spider aragog" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter2-movie-spider aragog.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter2-movie-spider_aragog.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9d/Harry-potter2-movie-spider_aragog.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190819144011"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9d/Harry-potter2-movie-spider_aragog.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190819144011" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter2-movie-spider aragog" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9d/Harry-potter2-movie-spider_aragog.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190819144011" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter2-movie-spider aragog.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter2-movie-spider_aragog.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/9d/Harry-potter2-movie-spider_aragog.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190819144011"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter2-movie-spider_aragog.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry and Ron following the spiders, which led them to Aragog</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Ron and Harry were both greatly upset when Hermione became another victim of the "monster", ending up <a href="/wiki/Petrification" title="Petrification">petrified</a> in the Hospital Wing, though she left her friends a clue that led them to deduce that the monster was a <a href="/wiki/Serpent_of_Slytherin" title="Serpent of Slytherin">basilisk</a>. Ron showed incredible bravery during the course of their investigation by venturing into the Forbidden Forest to an <a href="/wiki/Acromantula" title="Acromantula">Acromantula</a> den led by Aragog, in spite of his extreme fear of spiders.
</p><p>Harry and Ron learned <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Rubeus Hagrid</a> had nothing to do with opening the chamber, but when Aragog tried to make a meal of them, they narrowly escaped thanks to the magic that had engulfed the Flying Ford Anglia.<sup id="cite_ref-CS_33-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-CS-33"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>33<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> After escaping the forest Ron was furious with Hagrid for endangering their lives.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Skirmish_in_the_Chamber_of_Secrets">Skirmish in the Chamber of Secrets</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">"<i>HER SKELETON WILL LIE IN THE CHAMBER FOREVER</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— The final message on the wall<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>When he and Harry learned that <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny</a> (Ron's younger sister) was dying in the Chamber of Secrets, they raced to save her, planning to give their information to Professor <a href="/wiki/Gilderoy_Lockhart" title="Gilderoy Lockhart">Gilderoy Lockhart</a>. When the pair discovered that the professor was attempting to flee, they drew their wands on him and forced him to join them as they ventured into the Chamber of Secrets.
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fc/Harry-potter2-chamber.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170718073143" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter2-chamber" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="103" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter2-chamber.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter2-chamber.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fc/Harry-potter2-chamber.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170718073143"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fc/Harry-potter2-chamber.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170718073143" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter2-chamber" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fc/Harry-potter2-chamber.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170718073143" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="103" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter2-chamber.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter2-chamber.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fc/Harry-potter2-chamber.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170718073143"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter2-chamber.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron, Harry, and Lockhart standing in the Chamber of Secrets next to Basilisk skin</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Shortly after Ron, Harry and Lockhart entered the Chamber, Lockhart attempted to <a href="/wiki/Memory_Charm" title="Memory Charm">wipe their memories</a> in order to get out of the Chamber and take credit for their efforts in a bid for fame. Unfortunately for him, he used Ron's damaged wand, and the spell backfired, causing permanent amnesia in Lockhart. Ron was left behind to tend to Lockhart, as Harry delved deeper into the Chamber, saving Ginny and defeating <a href="/wiki/Serpent_of_Slytherin" title="Serpent of Slytherin">Salazar Slytherin's basilisk</a>, avenging all its petrified victims.<sup id="cite_ref-CS_33-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-CS-33"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>33<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Afterwards, Ron was honoured with a <a href="/wiki/Special_Award_for_Services_to_the_School" title="Special Award for Services to the School">Special Award for Services to the School</a>, as well as earning two hundred House points for Gryffindor for his work concerning re-sealing the Chamber of Secrets.<sup id="cite_ref-CS_33-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-CS-33"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>33<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Third_year">Third year</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban"><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>Sirius Black escaped to come after you? Oh, Harry... you'll have to be really, really careful. don't go looking for trouble, Harry...</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry</b>: "<i>I don't go looking for trouble. Trouble usually finds me.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley</b>: "<i>How thick would Harry have to be, to go looking for a nutter who wants to kill him?</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Harry, Ron and Hermione discussing Sirius Black's escape<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban" title="Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/50/Weasley_Wizarding_Vacation_in_Egypt.png/revision/latest?cb=20220726012818" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Weasley Wizarding Vacation in Egypt" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="166" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Weasley Wizarding Vacation in Egypt.png" data-image-key="Weasley_Wizarding_Vacation_in_Egypt.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/50/Weasley_Wizarding_Vacation_in_Egypt.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20220726012818"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/50/Weasley_Wizarding_Vacation_in_Egypt.png/revision/latest?cb=20220726012818" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Weasley Wizarding Vacation in Egypt" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/50/Weasley_Wizarding_Vacation_in_Egypt.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20220726012818" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="166" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Weasley Wizarding Vacation in Egypt.png" data-image-key="Weasley_Wizarding_Vacation_in_Egypt.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/50/Weasley_Wizarding_Vacation_in_Egypt.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20220726012818"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Weasley_Wizarding_Vacation_in_Egypt.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron and his family in <a href="/wiki/Egypt" title="Egypt">Egypt</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>In the summer following Ron's second year at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>, the <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family" title="Weasley family">Weasleys</a> won the <a href="/wiki/Daily_Prophet_Grand_Prize_Galleon_Draw" title="Daily Prophet Grand Prize Galleon Draw"><i>Daily Prophet</i> Grand Prize Galleon Draw</a>. Ron and his family used the money to travel to Egypt to visit Ron's eldest brother, <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill</a>. News of their lucky break made the <i>Daily Prophet</i>, and Ron sent that newspaper clipping and a <a href="/wiki/Sneakoscope" title="Sneakoscope">Sneakoscope</a> to <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry</a> for his thirteenth birthday. They met on the last day of the summer, when Ron and his family visited <a href="/wiki/Diagon_Alley" title="Diagon Alley">Diagon Alley</a> with Harry and <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a> and took up rooms in the <a href="/wiki/Leaky_Cauldron" title="Leaky Cauldron">Leaky Cauldron</a> in preparation for catching the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Express" title="Hogwarts Express">Hogwarts Express</a>. Ron's parents also purchased him <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley%27s_second_wand" title="Ronald Weasley's second wand">a new wand</a> to replace the broken one he had lost the previous year.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_5-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-5"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>5<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>During their stay at the Leaky Cauldron, Ron shared a room with his brother Percy. Unfortunately, this led to a fight. Percy believed that Ron had taken his Head Boy badge, which had actually been stolen by Weasley twins Fred and George. Harry found the twins hiding, enchanting the badge to say "<i>Big Head Boy</i>". Later, Ron was also accused of smudging a picture of Percy's girlfriend, <a href="/wiki/Penelope_Clearwater" title="Penelope Clearwater">Penelope Clearwater</a> with tea (Penelope thus hid herself outside the frame so nobody could see her splotched nose).<sup id="cite_ref-POA_5-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-5"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>5<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/B3C5M7_Dementor_on_Hogwarts_Express.png/revision/latest?cb=20180424031501" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B3C5M7 Dementor on Hogwarts Express" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="89" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B3C5M7 Dementor on Hogwarts Express.png" data-image-key="B3C5M7_Dementor_on_Hogwarts_Express.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/B3C5M7_Dementor_on_Hogwarts_Express.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180424031501"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/B3C5M7_Dementor_on_Hogwarts_Express.png/revision/latest?cb=20180424031501" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B3C5M7 Dementor on Hogwarts Express" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/B3C5M7_Dementor_on_Hogwarts_Express.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180424031501" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="89" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B3C5M7 Dementor on Hogwarts Express.png" data-image-key="B3C5M7_Dementor_on_Hogwarts_Express.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4b/B3C5M7_Dementor_on_Hogwarts_Express.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180424031501"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B3C5M7_Dementor_on_Hogwarts_Express.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Dementors boarding the Hogwarts Express in search of Sirius Black</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Also that summer, Sirius Black, the most famous prisoner in <a href="/wiki/Azkaban" title="Azkaban">Azkaban</a>, escaped, and in light of this incident, security was tightened at Hogwarts which Ron and his friends noticed when the Hogwarts Express was stopped and searched by <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a>. Once at the school, <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a> announced that Dementors would be stationed around the school gates to prevent Black from entering Hogwarts. This was done under the assumption that Harry was being targeted by Black.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_5-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-5"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>5<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Beginning_of_term">Beginning of term</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban"><b>Ron</b>: "<i>But look, see this morning? Nine o'clock, Divination. And underneath, nine o'clock, Muggle Studies. And — look— underneath that, Arithmancy, nine o'clock. I mean, I know you're good, Hermione, but no one's that good. How're you supposed to be in three classes at once?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>Don't be silly. Of course I won't be in three classes at once.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Hermione having an impossible timetable while talking electives<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban" title="Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p>Upon starting the term, the <a href="/wiki/Third_year" title="Third year">third-years</a> began taking new lessons. Ron and Harry had chosen <a href="/wiki/Divination" title="Divination">Divination</a> and <a href="/wiki/Care_of_Magical_Creatures" title="Care of Magical Creatures">Care of Magical Creatures</a>, while Hermione decided to take every possible class offered and began to exhibit strange behaviour that neither Ron nor Harry could figure out. The pair quickly decided that Divination was not a class they really liked and that the professor, <a href="/wiki/Sybill_Trelawney" title="Sybill Trelawney">Sybill Trelawney</a>, was a fraud.
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/46/B3C6M3.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161220002522" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B3C6M3" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="91" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B3C6M3.jpg" data-image-key="B3C6M3.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/46/B3C6M3.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161220002522"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/46/B3C6M3.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161220002522" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B3C6M3" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/46/B3C6M3.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161220002522" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="91" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B3C6M3.jpg" data-image-key="B3C6M3.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/46/B3C6M3.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161220002522"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B3C6M3.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron's first Care of Magical Creatures lesson</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Ron's first Care of Magical Creatures was a disaster. <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a>, the new Care of Magical Creatures professor, had planned what he thought to be a spectacular class on <a href="/wiki/Hippogriff" title="Hippogriff">hippogriffs</a>, when a hippogriff named <a href="/wiki/Buckbeak" title="Buckbeak">Buckbeak</a> attacked <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a> after Malfoy had insulted the rare creature, causing Malfoy to promise revenge. Also during that week, Ron had his first <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> class with the new professor, <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a>, and in short order Ron thought that Lupin was an excellent professor.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_5-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-5"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>5<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="First_time_in_Hogsmeade">First time in Hogsmeade</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban"><b>Ron</b>: "<i>See? I'd like to see Black try and break into Honeydukes with Dementors swarming all over the village. Anyway, Hermione, the Honeydukes owners would hear a breakin, wouldn't they? They live over the shop!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>Yes, but — but — Look, Harry still shouldn't be coming into Hogsmeade. He hasn't got a signed form! If anyone finds out, he'll be in so much trouble! And it's not nightfall yet — what if Sirius Black turns up today? Now?</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Ron</b>: "<i>He'd have a job spotting Harry in this. Come on, Hermione, it's Christmas. Harry deserves a break.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Harry joining ron and Hermione in Hogsmeade without premission<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban" title="Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p>On Hallowe'en, Ron and Hermione went on their first Hogsmeade trip. Harry, however, could not join them as his <a href="/wiki/Vernon_Dursley" title="Vernon Dursley">uncle Vernon</a> had not signed his Hogsmeade permission slip. Meanwhile, Ron and Hermione visited every building in Hogsmeade and brought back loads of sweets from Honeydukes for Harry. They were discussing blood-flavored lollipops and Cockroach Clusters.
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e6/The_trio_laughing_in_the_snow.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140306200454" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="The trio laughing in the snow" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="130" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="The trio laughing in the snow.gif" data-image-key="The_trio_laughing_in_the_snow.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e6/The_trio_laughing_in_the_snow.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140306200454"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e6/The_trio_laughing_in_the_snow.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140306200454" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="The trio laughing in the snow" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e6/The_trio_laughing_in_the_snow.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140306200454" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="130" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="The trio laughing in the snow.gif" data-image-key="The_trio_laughing_in_the_snow.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e6/The_trio_laughing_in_the_snow.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140306200454"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:The_trio_laughing_in_the_snow.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron, Harry, and Hermione at <a href="/wiki/Hogsmeade" title="Hogsmeade">Hogsmeade</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry used the Marauder's Map to sneak into Hogsmeade. He then met Ron and Hermione in <a href="/wiki/Honeydukes" title="Honeydukes">Honeydukes</a>. They visited the <a href="/wiki/Three_Broomsticks_Inn" title="Three Broomsticks Inn">Three Broomsticks</a>, a pub run by <a href="/wiki/Rosmerta" title="Rosmerta">Madam Rosmerta</a>. When <a href="/wiki/Cornelius_Fudge" title="Cornelius Fudge">Cornelius Fudge</a>, <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Minerva McGonagall</a>, <a href="/wiki/Filius_Flitwick" title="Filius Flitwick">Filius Flitwick</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Rubeus Hagrid</a> arrived, Harry hide underneath their table to avoid being seen. Harry used a tunnel to sneak into Hogsmeade village.
</p><p>While sneaking back into the school, he overheard a disturbing conversation that had a severe impact on his mental state.<sup id="cite_ref-POA102_36-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA102-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a> was his parents' best friend, and was his godfather and legal guardian. Black was the Potters' <a href="/wiki/Secret_Keeper" title="Secret Keeper">Secret Keeper</a> and he allegedly divulged the Potters' secret whereabouts to <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a> and murdered their friend <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">Peter Pettigrew</a>, as well as twelve <a href="/wiki/Non-magic_people" title="Non-magic people">Muggle</a> bystanders. Peter left a finger to prove that he had been killed with the twelve Muggles.<sup id="cite_ref-POA102_36-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA102-36"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>36<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> That evening, Sirius Black sneaked into Hogwarts, and the students were forced to spend the night in the Dining Hall.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_5-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-5"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>5<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="The_disappearance_of_Scabbers">The disappearance of Scabbers</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban"><b>Fred Weasley</b>: "<i>Come on, Ron, you were always saying how boring Scabbers was. And he's been off-colour for ages, he was wasting away. It was probably better for him to snuff it quickly. One swallow — he probably didn't feel a thing.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Ron</b>: "<i>He bit Goyle for us once! Remember, Harry?</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Fred Weasley</b>: "<i>His finest hour. Let the scar on Goyle's finger stand as a lasting tribute to his memory...</i>"</dd>
<dd>— <a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley" title="Fred Weasley">Fred</a> comforting Ron on the perceived death of Scabbers<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban" title="Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p>Just before <a href="/wiki/Christmas" title="Christmas">Christmas</a>, Rubeus Hagrid received a complaint from the <a href="/wiki/Committee_for_the_Disposal_of_Dangerous_Creatures" title="Committee for the Disposal of Dangerous Creatures">Committee for the Disposal of Dangerous Creatures</a> about Buckbeak the hippogriff. When he shared this incident with Ron, Harry, and Hermione, the trio promised to do everything in their power to help defend Buckbeak.
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2a/B3C13M1_RonFlyingFirebolt.png/revision/latest?cb=20160723005744" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B3C13M1 RonFlyingFirebolt" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="112" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B3C13M1 RonFlyingFirebolt.png" data-image-key="B3C13M1_RonFlyingFirebolt.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2a/B3C13M1_RonFlyingFirebolt.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160723005744"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2a/B3C13M1_RonFlyingFirebolt.png/revision/latest?cb=20160723005744" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B3C13M1 RonFlyingFirebolt" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2a/B3C13M1_RonFlyingFirebolt.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160723005744" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="112" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B3C13M1 RonFlyingFirebolt.png" data-image-key="B3C13M1_RonFlyingFirebolt.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2a/B3C13M1_RonFlyingFirebolt.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160723005744"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B3C13M1_RonFlyingFirebolt.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron riding Harry's Firebolt for the first time on the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Quidditch_pitch" title="Hogwarts Quidditch pitch">Hogwarts Quidditch pitch</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Ron and Harry put the defence of Buckbeak on the back-burner when on Christmas Day, Harry received a <a href="/wiki/Firebolt" title="Firebolt">Firebolt</a> broomstick from a mysterious sender. When Hermione, afraid for Harry's safety, turned the Firebolt in, Ron stopped talking to Hermione. The Firebolt incident only added to the rough tension between the two, as Hermione's new pet <a href="/wiki/Crookshanks" title="Crookshanks">Crookshanks</a> had been continually trying to attack Ron's rat, Scabbers. A few weeks later, when the two were on the verge of making up, Scabbers disappeared and Ron blamed Crookshanks, threatening the friendship between them.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_5-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-5"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>5<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span id="Sirius_Black.27s_infiltration"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Sirius_Black's_infiltration">Sirius Black's infiltration</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">"<i>IT WASN’T A NIGHTMARE! PROFESSOR, I WOKE UP, AND SIRIUS BLACK WAS STANDING OVER ME, HOLDING A KNIFE!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Ron waking up to a horrifying sight<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban" title="Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>In the meantime, Black was yet to be found, and the night following the <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a> vs <a href="/wiki/Ravenclaw" title="Ravenclaw">Ravenclaw</a> <a href="/wiki/Quidditch" title="Quidditch">Quidditch</a> match, he sneaked into Gryffindor tower. Hearing the sound of ripping bed curtains, Ron awoke with a start to see Sirius Black standing over him holding a knife. He screamed, and Black fled.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_5-7" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-5"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>5<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
