<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/18/Gryffindor_common_room_1993.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150729002112" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Gryffindor common room 1993" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="106" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Gryffindor common room 1993.jpg" data-image-key="Gryffindor_common_room_1993.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/18/Gryffindor_common_room_1993.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150729002112"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/18/Gryffindor_common_room_1993.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150729002112" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Gryffindor common room 1993" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/18/Gryffindor_common_room_1993.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150729002112" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="106" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Gryffindor common room 1993.jpg" data-image-key="Gryffindor_common_room_1993.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/18/Gryffindor_common_room_1993.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150729002112"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Gryffindor_common_room_1993.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Professor McGonagall</a> and the residents of Gryffindor Tower in the common room after Sirius Black's break-in</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>When Ron had woken up the entire <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor House</a> they all gathered in the <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor_Tower" title="Gryffindor Tower">Gryffindor Common Room</a> to discuss the events. <a href="/wiki/Professor" title="Professor">Professor</a> Minerva McGonagall, the <a href="/wiki/Head_of_House" title="Head of House">Head of House</a>, was called. Ron explained his story and theorised that Black must have gone for the wrong bed and was aiming for <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry Potter</a>. McGonagall asked Sir Cadogan about it and he told her that he had let Black enter after Black gave him the correct passcode.<sup id="cite_ref-PoA132_37-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PoA132-37"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>37<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Another search of the castle took place, but Black escaped capture again. The Fat Lady resumed her duty of guarding <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor_Tower" title="Gryffindor Tower">Gryffindor Tower</a> on the condition her portrait be guarded. <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville</a> was placed in detention and stripped of his visitation rights to <a href="/wiki/Hogsmeade" title="Hogsmeade">Hogsmeade</a> for the rest of the school year and the other Gryffindors were forbidden to tell him the password to the tower, forcing him to wait outside for someone to let him in while the security trolls guarding the Fat Lady leered unpleasantly at him. But none of that compared to the <a href="/wiki/Howler" title="Howler">Howler</a> his grandmother sent him during breakfast, which shouted at him that he had brought shame to the family.<sup id="cite_ref-PoA14_38-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PoA14-38"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>38<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Defence_of_Buckbeak">Defence of Buckbeak</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">"<i>The trip to Hagrid’s, though far from fun, had nevertheless had the effect Ron and Hermione had hoped. Though Harry had by no means forgotten about Black, he couldn’t brood constantly on revenge if he wanted to help Hagrid win his case against the <a href="/wiki/Committee_for_the_Disposal_of_Dangerous_Creatures" title="Committee for the Disposal of Dangerous Creatures">Committee for the Disposal of Dangerous Creatures</a>. He, Ron, and Hermione went to the library the next day and returned to the empty common room laden with books that might help prepare a defence for Buckbeak. The three of them sat in front of the roaring fire, slowly turning the pages of dusty volumes about famous cases of marauding beasts, speaking occasionally when they ran across something relevant.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Harry, Ron, and Hermione researching Buckbeak's defence<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban" title="Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>This incident made Ron famous among the other students, but he came back down to Earth when Hagrid scolded him and Harry about their treatment of Hermione, who Hagrid told them was in over her head with all of her classes and the work she was doing for Buckbeak. Shocked, the pair patched things up with her a few days later, when they received a letter from Hagrid saying that Buckbeak had been sentenced to execution.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_5-8" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-5"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>5<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/B3C16M2_Buckbeak%27s_execution.png/revision/latest?cb=20161210062642" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B3C16M2 Buckbeak's execution" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="112" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B3C16M2 Buckbeak's execution.png" data-image-key="B3C16M2_Buckbeak%27s_execution.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/B3C16M2_Buckbeak%27s_execution.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161210062642"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/B3C16M2_Buckbeak%27s_execution.png/revision/latest?cb=20161210062642" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B3C16M2 Buckbeak's execution" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/B3C16M2_Buckbeak%27s_execution.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161210062642" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="112" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B3C16M2 Buckbeak's execution.png" data-image-key="B3C16M2_Buckbeak%27s_execution.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/B3C16M2_Buckbeak%27s_execution.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161210062642"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B3C16M2_Buckbeak%27s_execution.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry, Ron, and Hermione visiting Hagrid right before Buckbeak's execution</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>With exams coming up, the trio set about studying and attempting to help Hagrid with Buckbeak's appeal. The appeal took place on the <a href="/wiki/6_June" title="6 June">last day of their exams</a>. Hearing that Buckbeak had lost, and was to be executed, Ron, Harry and Hermione went to visit Hagrid in the evening just before the execution. They offered to help set the record straight, but Hagrid told them that they would be in big trouble if they were seen. Helping the sobbing Hagrid make tea, Hermione found Scabbers hiding inside a milk jar. Soon they were hurried out the back of the hut, all the while they continued to lobby for a chance to set the record straight. When they heard what sounded like the killing, Ron, Harry and Hermione set off for Hogwarts in a slight state of shock.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_5-9" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-5"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>5<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="The_Prisoner_of_Azkaban">The Prisoner of Azkaban</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban"><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>Where's the dog?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Ron</b>: "<i>Not a dog. Harry, it's a trap... He's the dog... he's an Animagus.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Ron revealing that <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a> was an Animagus<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban" title="Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1a/Sirius_ron_whomping_willow.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180101215935" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Sirius ron whomping willow" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="100" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Sirius ron whomping willow.jpg" data-image-key="Sirius_ron_whomping_willow.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1a/Sirius_ron_whomping_willow.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180101215935"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1a/Sirius_ron_whomping_willow.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180101215935" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Sirius ron whomping willow" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1a/Sirius_ron_whomping_willow.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180101215935" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="100" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Sirius ron whomping willow.jpg" data-image-key="Sirius_ron_whomping_willow.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1a/Sirius_ron_whomping_willow.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180101215935"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Sirius_ron_whomping_willow.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a> capturing Ron and dragging him to the Whomping Willow</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Before they made it back there, <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew#Scabbers" title="Peter Pettigrew">Scabbers</a> began to squirm in Ron's hands and escaped. Not wanting to lose his rat again, Ron chased after Scabbers with Harry and Hermione behind him. He caught up to Scabbers, but not before they were in the shadow of the <a href="/wiki/Whomping_Willow" title="Whomping Willow">Whomping Willow</a> tree. He looked up to see a large black dog bearing down upon him. The dog dived at Ron and gripping Ron's arm in its mouth, it dragged him into the Whomping Willow. To try and stop the dog from pulling him further, Ron tied his feet around a tree branch, but the dog's grip was so powerful his leg snapped. When the dog reached the Shrieking Shack, it let go of Ron and revealed itself to be Sirius Black.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_5-10" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-5"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>5<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/Encounter_in_the_Shrieking_Shack_POAF.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161127052047" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Encounter in the Shrieking Shack POAF" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="164" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Encounter in the Shrieking Shack POAF.jpg" data-image-key="Encounter_in_the_Shrieking_Shack_POAF.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/Encounter_in_the_Shrieking_Shack_POAF.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161127052047"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/Encounter_in_the_Shrieking_Shack_POAF.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161127052047" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Encounter in the Shrieking Shack POAF" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/Encounter_in_the_Shrieking_Shack_POAF.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161127052047" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="164" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Encounter in the Shrieking Shack POAF.jpg" data-image-key="Encounter_in_the_Shrieking_Shack_POAF.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/Encounter_in_the_Shrieking_Shack_POAF.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161127052047"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Encounter_in_the_Shrieking_Shack_POAF.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio encountering Sirius Black in the Shrieking Shack</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Sirius ambushed Harry and Hermione, <a href="/wiki/Disarming_Charm" title="Disarming Charm">disarming</a> them when they entered the room where Ron was being held hostage. Upon seeing him, Harry attacked Black with Hermione and the seriously injured Ron helping in any way they could, but Harry could not bring himself to finish the job when he had Black in his power, and he was disarmed by <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Professor Lupin</a>. Relieved at the sight of Lupin, Ron became worried when Lupin and Black greeted each other like brothers and demanded that Ron turn over his rat, Scabbers. Sirius and Lupin then told them about their own years spent at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a> and how a wizard named <a href="/wiki/Peter_Pettigrew" title="Peter Pettigrew">Peter Pettigrew</a> betrayed Harry's parents to Voldemort then framed Sirius and transformed into a rat to go into hiding.
</p><p>Still not fully convinced, Ron reluctantly handed over Scabbers when Lupin promised that if he was actually a rat, no harm would come to him. Scabbers was revealed to be Pettigrew, whom Sirius had recognised due to a missing toe. (Pettigrew has cut off one of his own fingers before transforming). A tearful Pettigrew confessed to the betrayal and begged for mercy from his former friends.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_5-11" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-5"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>5<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d2/Dumbledore_Bedside_Manner_POA.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170106042250" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Dumbledore Bedside Manner POA" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="164" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Dumbledore Bedside Manner POA.jpg" data-image-key="Dumbledore_Bedside_Manner_POA.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d2/Dumbledore_Bedside_Manner_POA.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170106042250"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d2/Dumbledore_Bedside_Manner_POA.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20170106042250" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Dumbledore Bedside Manner POA" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d2/Dumbledore_Bedside_Manner_POA.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170106042250" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="164" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Dumbledore Bedside Manner POA.jpg" data-image-key="Dumbledore_Bedside_Manner_POA.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d2/Dumbledore_Bedside_Manner_POA.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170106042250"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Dumbledore_Bedside_Manner_POA.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron in the Hospital Wing with a broken leg, unable to walk</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>When it was decided that Pettigrew should be turned over to the <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a>, Lupin splinted Ron's leg, and the assembled company left for Hogwarts. Along the way, the full moon broke out, and Lupin began to transform into a werewolf. In the skirmish, Pettigrew stole Lupin's wand, <a href="/wiki/Stunning_Spell" title="Stunning Spell">stunned</a> Ron, and escaped into the moonlight. Hours later in the <a href="/wiki/Hospital_Wing" title="Hospital Wing">Hospital Wing</a>, Ron was recovering both from his broken leg and Pettigrew's attack. As he was unable to walk, Ron did not join Harry and Hermione on their rescue mission to <a href="/wiki/Rescue_of_Sirius_Black_and_Buckbeak" title="Rescue of Sirius Black and Buckbeak">save</a> Sirius from the <a href="/wiki/Dementor%27s_Kiss" title="Dementor's Kiss">Dementor's Kiss</a> and Buckbeak from execution with Hermione's <a href="/wiki/Time-Turner" title="Time-Turner">Time-Turner</a>, though they would explain everything to him after they were successful in their task.<sup id="cite_ref-POA_5-12" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-5"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>5<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="End-of-term">End-of-term</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">"<i>Ron's eyes widened. The minute owl was still hooting excitedly. 'Keep him?' he said uncertainly. He looked closely at the owl for a moment; then, to Harry's and Hermione's great surprise, he held him out for <a href="/wiki/Crookshanks" title="Crookshanks">Crookshanks</a> to sniff.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Ron receiving a miniature owl from Sirius Black<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban" title="Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>Ron understood why Hermione did not immediately mention the <a href="/wiki/Time-Turner" title="Time-Turner">Time-Turner</a>. Ron was slightly dismayed but, now knowing the reason for her strange behaviour and timetable earlier on, he was nevertheless relieved that Sirius and Buckbeak were both safe and free.
</p>

<p>As a replacement for his lost pet, Sirius sent Ron a tiny owl. Ron, to the surprise of both Harry and Hermione, allowed Crookshanks to sniff the owl. Crookshanks gave his approval, thus confirming that it was in fact just an owl. Ginny immediately named it <a href="/wiki/Pigwidgeon" title="Pigwidgeon">Pigwidgeon</a> because she thought the name was "<i>sweet</i>"; annoyed and disgusted at this, Ron tried to choose another name, but it was too late, so he settled for using the nickname "Pig".<sup id="cite_ref-POA_5-13" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-POA-5"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>5<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Fourth_year">Fourth year</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">"<i>Look, it's always you who gets all the attention, you know it is. I know it's not your fault. I know you don't ask for it...but — well — you know, Ron's got all those brothers to compete against at home, and you're his best friend, and you're really famous — he's always shunted to one side whenever people see you, and he puts up with it, and he never mentions it, but I suppose this is just one time too many...</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Hermione explaining Ron's jealousy after Harry's name came out of the <a href="/wiki/Goblet_of_Fire" title="Goblet of Fire">Goblet of Fire</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="The_Quidditch_World_Cup">The Quidditch World Cup</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a In the summer of 1994, Ron invited Harry and Hermione to accompany the Weasleys to the <a href="/wiki/Quidditch_World_Cup" title="Quidditch World Cup">Quidditch World Cup</a>, which was being held in Britain for the first time in decades. While Hermione joined the <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family" title="Weasley family">Weasleys</a> at <a href="/wiki/The_Burrow" title="The Burrow">The Burrow</a>, Harry had to be picked up from the Dursleys. Arthur Weasley arranged to pick up Harry via <a href="/wiki/Floo_Network" title="Floo Network">Floo Network</a>, not knowing that the Dursleys' fireplace was blocked, so when Ron, Arthur, Fred and George tried to fetch Harry they ended up stuck in the chimney. Part of the Dursleys' house was destroyed before Harry returned to the Weasley's house.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_32-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup></p><figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4a/Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-world_cup.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180108184623" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-world cup" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-world_cup.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron at the 1994 Quidditch World Cup with his friends and family</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure><p>The following day, Harry, Hermione, and all the Weasleys except Molly Weasley left for the Quidditch World Cup, where they set up camp and met many of their friends from Hogwarts or the Ministry. They had prime seats for the match, thanks to Mr Weasley, who had helped <a href="/wiki/Ludovic_Bagman" title="Ludovic Bagman">Ludo Bagman</a>, Head of the <a href="/wiki/Department_of_Magical_Games_and_Sports" title="Department of Magical Games and Sports">Department of Magical Games and Sports</a>, out of a messy problem. During the match Ron watched <a href="/wiki/Viktor_Krum" title="Viktor Krum">Viktor Krum</a>, the <a href="/wiki/Bulgaria" title="Bulgaria">Bulgarian</a> <a href="/wiki/Seeker" title="Seeker">Seeker</a>, play an excellent match and catch the <a href="/wiki/Golden_Snitch" title="Golden Snitch">Snitch</a>. Even though Krum caught the Snitch the Irish National Quidditch Team still won the match.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_32-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>That night, while the Irish supporters were still awake celebrating their victory, trouble began. Some <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> who had managed to avoid imprisonment in Azkaban, attacked the camp where Ron and his friends and family were staying. Mr Weasley ordered Ron, Harry, Hermione, Fred, George, and Ginny to get to safety, while he and the older Weasley children set off to help the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a>. Fred and George were responsible for Ginny's safety, which left the trio to themselves.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_32-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a data-image-name="B4C9M1 the trio seeing the Dark Mark.png" data-image-key="B4C9M1_the_trio_seeing_the_Dark_Mark.png" data-relevant="1" href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/B4C9M1_the_trio_seeing_the_Dark_Mark.png/revision/latest?cb=20241204193358" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B4C9M1 the trio seeing the Dark Mark" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fe/B4C9M1_the_trio_seeing_the_Dark_Mark.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20241204193358" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="118" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B4C9M1 the trio seeing the Dark Mark.png" data-image-key="B4C9M1_the_trio_seeing_the_Dark_Mark.png" class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B4C9M1_the_trio_seeing_the_Dark_Mark.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron, Harry, and Hermione after the riot at the Quidditch World Cup</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure><p>Running off into the woods, Ron, Hermione, and Harry quickly lost Fred, George and Ginny, but they did find <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a>. Malfoy meanly suggested that Hermione, being a Muggle-Born, could easily be targeted by the Death Eaters, causing Ron to insist that she and Harry join him in going deeper into the woods. Soon they reached a patch of woods giving off a silver glow, where the trio found a few <a href="/wiki/Veela" title="Veela">Veela</a> witches surrounded by admirers. Ron was entranced and stated that he would create a broom that would fly to space. They had reached an empty clearing when they heard an <a href="/wiki/Bartemius_Crouch_Junior" title="Bartemius Crouch Junior">unknown person</a> <a href="/wiki/Morsmordre" title="Morsmordre">cast</a> the <a href="/wiki/Dark_Mark" title="Dark Mark">Dark Mark</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_32-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Beginning_of_the_year">Beginning of the year</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">"<i>Some lesson, though, eh? Fred and George were right, weren't they? He really knows his stuff, Moody, doesn't he? When he did Avada Kedavra, the way that spider just died, just snuffed it right —</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— The trio witnessing the effects of the <a href="/wiki/Unforgivable_Curses" title="Unforgivable Curses">Unforgivable Curses</a> for the first time<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/B4C14M1_DADA_Unforgivable_Curses.png/revision/latest?cb=20190313000729" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B4C14M1 DADA Unforgivable Curses" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="91" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B4C14M1 DADA Unforgivable Curses.png" data-image-key="B4C14M1_DADA_Unforgivable_Curses.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/B4C14M1_DADA_Unforgivable_Curses.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190313000729"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/B4C14M1_DADA_Unforgivable_Curses.png/revision/latest?cb=20190313000729" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B4C14M1 DADA Unforgivable Curses" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/B4C14M1_DADA_Unforgivable_Curses.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190313000729" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="91" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B4C14M1 DADA Unforgivable Curses.png" data-image-key="B4C14M1_DADA_Unforgivable_Curses.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/B4C14M1_DADA_Unforgivable_Curses.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190313000729"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B4C14M1_DADA_Unforgivable_Curses.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio during a Defence Against the Dark Arts lesson on the Unforgivable Curses</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>On <a href="/wiki/1_September" title="1 September">1 September</a>, Ron and his friends departed for Hogwarts aboard the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Express" title="Hogwarts Express">Hogwarts Express</a>. That evening at the <a href="/wiki/Start-of-Term_Feast" title="Start-of-Term Feast">Start-of-Term Feast</a>, <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a> announced that Hogwarts would host the <a href="/wiki/Triwizard_Tournament" title="Triwizard Tournament">Triwizard Tournament</a>. Ron found himself caught up in dreams of being a Triwizard Champion, but he was snapped back to reality by his fourth year classes. In <a href="/wiki/Care_of_Magical_Creatures" title="Care of Magical Creatures">Care of Magical Creatures</a>, <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a> had his students tending to <a href="/wiki/Blast-Ended_Skrewt" title="Blast-Ended Skrewt">Blast-Ended Skrewts</a>, and in <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a>, Ron was impressed by the new professor, <a href="/wiki/Alastor_Moody" title="Alastor Moody">"Mad-Eye" Moody</a>, when he taught the class about the three Unforgivable Curses.
</p><p>It was announced that the students from the <a href="/wiki/Durmstrang_Institute" title="Durmstrang Institute">Durmstrang Institute</a> and <a href="/wiki/Beauxbatons_Academy_of_Magic" title="Beauxbatons Academy of Magic">Beauxbatons Academy of Magic</a> would be arriving at Hogwarts on 30 October. Ron was dumbstruck when he saw <a href="/wiki/Viktor_Krum" title="Viktor Krum">Viktor Krum</a> among the Durmstrang students, not realising how young his hero was. He was disappointed when Krum sat among the Slytherin students.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_32-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Envying_Harry_Potter">Envying Harry Potter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire"><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>I didn't put my name in that Goblet!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Ron</b>: "<i>Yeah, okay.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Ron and the student body were sceptical of Harry<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5b/Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-ron_goblet.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180108180238" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-ron goblet" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-ron goblet.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-ron_goblet.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5b/Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-ron_goblet.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180108180238"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5b/Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-ron_goblet.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180108180238" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-ron goblet" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5b/Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-ron_goblet.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180108180238" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-ron goblet.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-ron_goblet.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5b/Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-ron_goblet.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180108180238"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-ron_goblet.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">An angry Ron and an upset Hermione watching as Harry's name came out of the <a href="/wiki/Goblet_of_Fire" title="Goblet of Fire">Goblet of Fire</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Having discussed the possibility of somehow outsmarting the <a href="/wiki/Goblet_of_Fire" title="Goblet of Fire">Goblet of Fire</a> and the <a href="/wiki/Age_Line" title="Age Line">Age Line</a> that Dumbledore had cast around it, Ron was surprised to find that Harry's name had come out of the Goblet of Fire. Jealous of the fact that Harry always seemed to receive all the attention, Ron refused to accept that Harry didn't put his name in the cup. He even went as far as to accuse Harry of cheating his way into the tournament. After the argument, he and Harry stopped talking to each other, and Ron began hanging out with other Gryffindors like <a href="/wiki/Dean_Thomas" title="Dean Thomas">Dean Thomas</a> and <a href="/wiki/Seamus_Finnigan" title="Seamus Finnigan">Seamus Finnigan</a>. He did start to miss Harry after his jealousy burnt out and was unable to understand why Harry didn't want to hang out or talk to him anymore to the point where when Rita Skeeter released an article about Harry he just assumed Harry was enjoying the attention he was getting.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_32-7" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fd/B4C20M1_Horntail_%E2%80%93_first_task.png/revision/latest?cb=20161208133543" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B4C20M1 Horntail – first task" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B4C20M1 Horntail – first task.png" data-image-key="B4C20M1_Horntail_%E2%80%93_first_task.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fd/B4C20M1_Horntail_%E2%80%93_first_task.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161208133543"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fd/B4C20M1_Horntail_%E2%80%93_first_task.png/revision/latest?cb=20161208133543" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B4C20M1 Horntail – first task" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fd/B4C20M1_Horntail_%E2%80%93_first_task.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161208133543" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B4C20M1 Horntail – first task.png" data-image-key="B4C20M1_Horntail_%E2%80%93_first_task.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/fd/B4C20M1_Horntail_%E2%80%93_first_task.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161208133543"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B4C20M1_Horntail_%E2%80%93_first_task.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron and others watching Harry participate in the first task</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>When Ron heard Harry talking to <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">someone</a> one night, he went down to see who it was since Harry didn't tell him about such a thing, only to be met with hostility from a very embittered Harry. When Harry accused Ron of trying to spy on him and when he told him who he talked to was none of Ron's business, Ron was deeply offended to the point where he tried to get Harry to tell him whom he was talking to by accusing him of practising for an interview. This only made Harry throw one of Draco Malfoy's "<i>Potter Stinks</i>" badges at him and tell him he could wear that during the First Task of the Triwizard Tournament. This made Ron finally realise that the reason Harry had started avoiding him was because Harry felt betrayed by him to the point where he had lost Harry's trust and respect and Harry no longer saw him as a friend, a realisation that deeply hurt Ron.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_32-8" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Ron and Harry did not talk to each other again until after the First Task. After seeing just how much danger was involved in the task, Ron realised Harry would never have put his own name into the Goblet of Fire, and the two became best friends once again.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_32-9" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="The_Yule_Ball">The Yule Ball</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">"<i>Ron didn't answer. He was glaring at Hermione and Krum, who were dancing nearby. Padma was sitting with her arms and legs crossed, one foot jiggling in time to the music. Every now and then she threw a disgruntled look at Ron, who was completely ignoring her.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Ron's jealous of Hermione attending the Ball with Viktor Krum<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5a/GOF_HQ_still_Ron_Harry_looking_at_their_dress_robes.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190125033931" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="GOF HQ still Ron Harry looking at their dress robes" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="167" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="GOF HQ still Ron Harry looking at their dress robes.jpg" data-image-key="GOF_HQ_still_Ron_Harry_looking_at_their_dress_robes.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5a/GOF_HQ_still_Ron_Harry_looking_at_their_dress_robes.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190125033931"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5a/GOF_HQ_still_Ron_Harry_looking_at_their_dress_robes.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190125033931" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="GOF HQ still Ron Harry looking at their dress robes" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5a/GOF_HQ_still_Ron_Harry_looking_at_their_dress_robes.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190125033931" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="167" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="GOF HQ still Ron Harry looking at their dress robes.jpg" data-image-key="GOF_HQ_still_Ron_Harry_looking_at_their_dress_robes.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5a/GOF_HQ_still_Ron_Harry_looking_at_their_dress_robes.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190125033931"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:GOF_HQ_still_Ron_Harry_looking_at_their_dress_robes.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron wearing his more traditional dress robes</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Soon after the First Task, <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Professor McGonagall</a> told Ron and the other Gryffindor boys about the traditional <a href="/wiki/Yule_Ball" title="Yule Ball">Yule Ball</a>, held during the Triwizard Tournament. While all students above fourth year scampered around trying to find dates, Ron and Harry found it hard to ask girls to the ball. Struck by the beauty and charm of <a href="/wiki/Fleur_Delacour" title="Fleur Delacour">Fleur Delacour</a>, the Triwizard Champion from Beauxbatons Academy and a <a href="/wiki/Half-Veela" title="Half-Veela">part-Veela</a> witch, Ron asked her to attend the ball with him, but fled in embarrassment without waiting for an answer. He also offended Hermione by not asking her, and then by suggesting that she did not have a date and thus could accompany him.
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/af/Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-movie-screencaps.com-9205.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160513210615" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-movie-screencaps.com-9205" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-movie-screencaps.com-9205.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-movie-screencaps.com-9205.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/af/Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-movie-screencaps.com-9205.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160513210615"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/af/Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-movie-screencaps.com-9205.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160513210615" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-movie-screencaps.com-9205" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/af/Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-movie-screencaps.com-9205.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160513210615" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-movie-screencaps.com-9205.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-movie-screencaps.com-9205.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/af/Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-movie-screencaps.com-9205.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160513210615"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter-goblet-of-fire-movie-screencaps.com-9205.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron with his date at the Yule Ball</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry was eventually able to get them both dates with twins <a href="/wiki/Parvati_Patil" title="Parvati Patil">Parvati</a> and Padma Patil. Ron's evening was a fiasco of the first sort. His "<i>traditional</i>" dress robes embarrassed him and his date, <a href="/wiki/Padma_Patil" title="Padma Patil">Padma Patil</a>, and when Ron saw Hermione with <a href="/wiki/Viktor_Krum" title="Viktor Krum">Viktor Krum</a>, he became intensely jealous. This led to a blazing argument between them during the end of the ball, with Ron making comments about Krum being too old for her and Hermione accusing him of ruining everything. Though their friendship did not suffer, it was clear that both had developed feelings for each other.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_32-10" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>During the Yule Ball, Ron had overheard <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a> telling the Beaubaxtons Headmistress Olympe Maxime that he was half-giant. This information was also overheard by <i>Daily Prophet</i> Reporter <a href="/wiki/Rita_Skeeter" title="Rita Skeeter">Rita Skeeter</a>, who wrote an article telling the wizarding world of Hagrid's heritage. This drove Hagrid to stop teaching for a time until Ron, Harry, and Hermione told him that they he was still their friend, no matter what.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_32-11" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Imprisoned_by_sea_creatures">Imprisoned by sea creatures</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">"<i>Ron was tied between Hermione and <a href="/wiki/Cho_Chang" title="Cho Chang">Cho Chang</a>. There was also a girl who looked no older than eight, whose clouds of silvery hair made Harry feel sure that she was Fleur Delacour's sister. All four of them appeared to be in a very deep sleep. Their heads were lolling onto their shoulders, and fine streams of bubbles kept issuing from their mouths.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Hermione was Viktor Krum's "hostage" during the Second Task<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/90/Harry_ron_second_task.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140818010125" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry ron second task" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="135" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry ron second task.gif" data-image-key="Harry_ron_second_task.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/90/Harry_ron_second_task.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140818010125"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/90/Harry_ron_second_task.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140818010125" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry ron second task" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/90/Harry_ron_second_task.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140818010125" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="135" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry ron second task.gif" data-image-key="Harry_ron_second_task.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/90/Harry_ron_second_task.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140818010125"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_ron_second_task.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry</a> retrieving a captive Ron during the second task</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>On <a href="/wiki/24_February" title="24 February">24 February</a>, Ron was put into an enchanted sleep and tied up at the bottom of the <a href="/wiki/Great_Lake" title="Great Lake">Black Lake</a>, to be "rescued" by Harry as part of the second task of the Triwizard Tournament. When he found out that Harry had stayed behind to save Fleur's sister <a href="/wiki/Gabrielle_Delacour" title="Gabrielle Delacour">Gabrielle Delacour</a> as well, Ron jokingly took him to task, but was impressed when Harry was given extra points for "<i>outstanding moral fibre</i>".
</p><p>Fleur thanked Ron and Harry in turn for helping save Gabrielle, kissing both of them on the cheek. Ron gained much attention from the other students due to his being taken hostage for the task. He proceeded to exaggerate the events of what happened until Hermione called him on it.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_32-12" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Preparing_for_the_end">Preparing for the end</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire"><b>Draco Malfoy</b>: "<i>So. You caught some pathetic reporter, and Potter's Dumbledore's favourite boy again. Big deal. Trying not to think about it, are we? Trying to pretend it hasn't happened?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>Get out.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Draco Malfoy</b>: "<i>You've picked the losing side, Potter! I warned you! I told you you ought to choose your company more carefully, remember? When we met on the train, first day at Hogwarts? I told you not to hang around with riffraff like this! Too late now. Potter! They'll be the first to go, now the Dark Lord's back! <a href="/wiki/Mudblood" title="Mudblood">Mudbloods</a> and Muggle-lovers first! Well — second — Diggory was the f—</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Malfoy taunting the trio over the return of Lord Voldemort<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p>Early in the spring, Ron joined Harry and Hermione in visiting <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a>, who had taken to hiding in Hogsmeade. There, they discussed the disappearances of Ministry officials <a href="/wiki/Bartemius_Crouch_Senior" title="Bartemius Crouch Senior">Barty Crouch Snr</a> and <a href="/wiki/Bertha_Jorkins" title="Bertha Jorkins">Bertha Jorkins</a>. In the weeks leading up to the final tournament task, Ron and Hermione helped Harry prepare by researching and trying out different jinxes and other helpful spells for the task. Ron and Hermione watched Harry together from the sidelines.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_32-13" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/B4C36M1_Snape_Dark_Mark_reveal.png/revision/latest?cb=20241212174609" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B4C36M1 Snape Dark Mark reveal" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B4C36M1 Snape Dark Mark reveal.png" data-image-key="B4C36M1_Snape_Dark_Mark_reveal.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/B4C36M1_Snape_Dark_Mark_reveal.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20241212174609"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/B4C36M1_Snape_Dark_Mark_reveal.png/revision/latest?cb=20241212174609" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B4C36M1 Snape Dark Mark reveal" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/B4C36M1_Snape_Dark_Mark_reveal.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20241212174609" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="102" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B4C36M1 Snape Dark Mark reveal.png" data-image-key="B4C36M1_Snape_Dark_Mark_reveal.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/78/B4C36M1_Snape_Dark_Mark_reveal.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20241212174609"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B4C36M1_Snape_Dark_Mark_reveal.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron was present when the Minister for Magic visited Harry in the hospital wing</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>They were shocked when Harry returned with <a href="/wiki/Cedric_Diggory" title="Cedric Diggory">Cedric Diggory</a>'s dead body. Ron was relieved to see Harry when he was brought to the infirmary by <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Professor Dumbledore</a>, eagerly wanted to question Harry about Diggory, but he was told off by Molly Weasley who, along with his brother <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill Weasley</a>, had come to watch Harry. Ron was furious with the Minister for Magic, <a href="/wiki/Cornelius_Fudge" title="Cornelius Fudge">Cornelius Fudge</a>, when he refused to believe Harry and Dumbledore, and calmed Molly when she was shocked by Black's appearance in the room. Ron did not go against Harry's story when he finally heard it, sticking by his best friend.<sup id="cite_ref-GOF_32-14" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-GOF-32"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>32<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Fifth_year">Fifth year</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">"<i>Weasley cannot save a thing, he cannot block a single ring.<br>That's why Slytherins all sing, Weasley is our king!...</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— <a href="/wiki/Slytherin" title="Slytherin">Slytherins</a> mocking Ron's <a href="/wiki/Keeper" title="Keeper">Keeper</a> abilities<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/B5C6M1_Doxycide_Grimmauld_Place.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180420213240" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B5C6M1 Doxycide Grimmauld Place" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B5C6M1 Doxycide Grimmauld Place.jpg" data-image-key="B5C6M1_Doxycide_Grimmauld_Place.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/B5C6M1_Doxycide_Grimmauld_Place.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180420213240"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/B5C6M1_Doxycide_Grimmauld_Place.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180420213240" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B5C6M1 Doxycide Grimmauld Place" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/B5C6M1_Doxycide_Grimmauld_Place.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180420213240" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B5C6M1 Doxycide Grimmauld Place.jpg" data-image-key="B5C6M1_Doxycide_Grimmauld_Place.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/B5C6M1_Doxycide_Grimmauld_Place.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180420213240"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B5C6M1_Doxycide_Grimmauld_Place.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron with others in 12 Grimmauld Place preparing to clean</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>After Voldemort rose to power and the <a href="/wiki/Second_Wizarding_War" title="Second Wizarding War">Second Wizarding War</a> began, <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a> reformed the <a href="/wiki/Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Order of the Phoenix">Order of the Phoenix</a>. In the summer of 1995, the Order moved into their headquarters at <a href="/wiki/12_Grimmauld_Place" title="12 Grimmauld Place">12 Grimmauld Place</a> with the Weasley schoolchildren and Hermione Granger, where they helped <a href="/wiki/Molly_Weasley" title="Molly Weasley">Molly Weasley</a> clean the old house and remained watchful for information about Harry. In August, Harry arrived at the headquarters after a <a href="/wiki/Attack_in_Little_Whinging" title="Attack in Little Whinging">Dementor attack</a> on his cousin. Ron felt sorry that he had to keep Harry oblivious to the Order's plan and soon learnt that Harry's anger had been growing due to his isolation from his friends and his persecution by the media.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_6-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-6"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>6<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Ron, Harry and Hermione stayed at Grimmauld Place throughout August. In late August, Ron and Hermione were made a <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a> <a href="/wiki/Prefect" title="Prefect">prefect</a>, for which Molly and Arthur gave Ron a new <a href="/wiki/Cleansweep_Eleven" title="Cleansweep Eleven">Cleansweep Eleven</a>. Bound by their prefect duties, Ron and Hermione were separated from Harry on the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Express" title="Hogwarts Express">Hogwarts Express</a> and could only join Harry in his compartment for the last part of the journey. When they arrived, Ron expressed concern that <a href="/wiki/Rubeus_Hagrid" title="Rubeus Hagrid">Hagrid</a> was not at the welcoming feast and was suspicious of the new <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a> professor, <a href="/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge" title="Dolores Umbridge">Dolores Umbridge</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_6-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-6"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>6<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/07/Umbridge_teaching.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160606154912" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Umbridge teaching" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="110" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Umbridge teaching.jpg" data-image-key="Umbridge_teaching.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/07/Umbridge_teaching.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160606154912"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/07/Umbridge_teaching.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160606154912" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Umbridge teaching" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/07/Umbridge_teaching.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160606154912" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="110" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Umbridge teaching.jpg" data-image-key="Umbridge_teaching.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/07/Umbridge_teaching.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160606154912"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Umbridge_teaching.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The first DADA class with Umbridge as the professor</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>At school, Ron was one of the many students who expressed frustration with Professor Umbridge's refusal to teach the class practical defensive magic. He also won the position of <a href="/wiki/Keeper" title="Keeper">Keeper</a> on the <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor_Quidditch_team" title="Gryffindor Quidditch team">Gryffindor Quidditch team</a> but was described by the team captain as "<i>needing improvement</i>". Ron's <a href="/wiki/Quidditch" title="Quidditch">Quidditch</a> practice caused him to fall behind in his schoolwork, to Hermione's chagrin. Soon, Ron's brother <a href="/wiki/Percy_Weasley" title="Percy Weasley">Percy Weasley</a> sent him a <a href="/wiki/Percy_Weasley%27s_letter_to_Ronald_Weasley_(II)" title="Percy Weasley's letter to Ronald Weasley (II)">letter</a> advising him not to remain friends with Harry, whom he accused of being mad for supporting <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_6-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-6"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>6<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Ron was outraged by the letter's contents, tearing it into eight pieces and throwing it into the Gryffindor common room's fireplace, angrily declaring his brother to be "<i>the world's biggest git</i>".
</p>
<h5><span id="Initiating_Dumbledore.27s_Army"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Initiating_Dumbledore's_Army">Initiating Dumbledore's Army</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: The trio forming the initial idea of Dumbledore's Army"><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>Isn't it obvious? I'm talking about you, Harry.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>About me what?</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>I'm talking about you teaching us <a href="/wiki/Defence_Against_the_Dark_Arts" title="Defence Against the Dark Arts">Defence Against the Dark Arts</a>.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Ron</b>: "<i>That's an idea.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— The trio forming the initial idea of Dumbledore's Army<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7c/The_trio_looking_worried.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150729005728" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="The trio looking worried" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="110" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="The trio looking worried.jpg" data-image-key="The_trio_looking_worried.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7c/The_trio_looking_worried.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150729005728"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7c/The_trio_looking_worried.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150729005728" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="The trio looking worried" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7c/The_trio_looking_worried.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150729005728" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="110" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="The trio looking worried.jpg" data-image-key="The_trio_looking_worried.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7c/The_trio_looking_worried.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150729005728"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:The_trio_looking_worried.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione proposing the formation of a practical study group taught by <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry</a> himself</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Late in September, one evening when Harry returned from detention with Professor Umbridge, Ron, somewhat reluctantly, joined Hermione in convincing that Harry teach his fellow students defence against the dark arts. Harry initially disagreed, but after a few days he decided to give it a go. Around this time, Professor Umbridge was appointed the first <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_High_Inquisitor" title="Hogwarts High Inquisitor">Hogwarts High Inquisitor</a>, giving her the power to randomly create new school rules and inspect teachers' lessons.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_6-7" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-6"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>6<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5c/DA_meeting_ootp.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180526232313" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="DA meeting ootp" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="106" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="DA meeting ootp.jpg" data-image-key="DA_meeting_ootp.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5c/DA_meeting_ootp.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180526232313"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5c/DA_meeting_ootp.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180526232313" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="DA meeting ootp" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5c/DA_meeting_ootp.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180526232313" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="106" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="DA meeting ootp.jpg" data-image-key="DA_meeting_ootp.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5c/DA_meeting_ootp.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180526232313"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:DA_meeting_ootp.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron during the meeting of students in the <a href="/wiki/Hog%27s_Head_Inn" title="Hog's Head Inn">Hog's Head</a> that would become known as Dumbledore's Army</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Late in October, students had their first visit to <a href="/wiki/Hogsmeade" title="Hogsmeade">Hogsmeade</a>. There, Harry, Ron, and Hermione met with several students who were interested in learning proper defence. Ron defended Harry against <a href="/wiki/Zacharias_Smith" title="Zacharias Smith">Zacharias Smith</a> when questions rose, and was among the first to sign the recruitment parchment. On the way home from Hogsmeade, Ron became upset when he learned from Hermione that his sister <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny</a> was dating Ravenclaw student <a href="/wiki/Michael_Corner" title="Michael Corner">Michael Corner</a>. The following morning, Ron awoke to find that suddenly, by order of Professor Umbridge, all student groups had been disbanded including the House Quidditch teams, but he was mollified when Harry said they would continue with their secret group, which Ginny named "<i><a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore's Army">Dumbledore's Army</a></i>" during their first meeting, mocking the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a>'s fears of student uprisings.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_6-8" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-6"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>6<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span id="Playing_Quidditch_and_Hagrid.27s_tale"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Playing_Quidditch_and_Hagrid's_tale">Playing Quidditch and Hagrid's tale</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry, Ron, and Hagrid discussing Hagrid's giant colony mission"><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>You knew where you were going? You knew where the giants were?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Rubeus Hagrid</b>: "<i>Well, Dumbledore knew, an' he told us.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley</b>: "<i>Are they hidden? Is it a secret where they are?</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Rubeus Hagrid</b>: "<i>Not really, it's jus' that mos' <a href="/wiki/Wizardkind" title="Wizardkind">wizards</a> aren' bothered where they are, s' long as it's a good long way away. But where they are's very difficult ter get ter, fer <a href="/wiki/Human" title="Human">humans</a> anyway, so we needed Dumbledore's instructions. Took us abou' a month ter get there —</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Harry, Ron, and Hagrid discussing Hagrid's giant colony mission<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p>In the weeks following the first Dumbledore's Army meeting, Quidditch season arrived. Ron had nervous issues prior to the first match against Slytherin. They had made badges saying "<i>Weasley is our king</i>", which Harry decided could not mean anything good. In an attempt to distract Ron from the Slytherins, Hermione kissed him on the cheek for luck, effectively stunning Ron. Ron's play was abysmal, and it was not helped by the Slytherins' new song also entitled, "<i><a href="/wiki/Weasley_is_Our_King" title="Weasley is Our King">Weasley is Our King</a></i>". Following the game Ron wanted to resign, but learned he could not, as Harry Potter, <a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley" title="Fred Weasley">Fred</a>, and <a href="/wiki/George_Weasley" title="George Weasley">George Weasley</a> had been banned from Quidditch for life.
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cf/Hagrid_talking_to_the_trio.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180104160652" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hagrid talking to the trio" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="114" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hagrid talking to the trio.jpg" data-image-key="Hagrid_talking_to_the_trio.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cf/Hagrid_talking_to_the_trio.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180104160652"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cf/Hagrid_talking_to_the_trio.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180104160652" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hagrid talking to the trio" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cf/Hagrid_talking_to_the_trio.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180104160652" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="114" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hagrid talking to the trio.jpg" data-image-key="Hagrid_talking_to_the_trio.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cf/Hagrid_talking_to_the_trio.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180104160652"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hagrid_talking_to_the_trio.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hagrid telling Harry, Ron, and Hermione of his negotiations with the <a href="/wiki/Giant" title="Giant">giants</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>That evening Hagrid returned from his unknown disappearance. Although initially resistant he regaled the trio with his tales of the <a href="/wiki/Giant" title="Giant">giants</a>, though he refused to give them any hint about his gruesome injuries from Golgomath's tribe. Ultimately Hagrid's mission was a failure.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_6-9" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-6"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>6<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Following Hagrid's return, he took up his post as <a href="/wiki/Care_of_Magical_Creatures" title="Care of Magical Creatures">Care of Magical Creatures</a> professor. In Hagrid's first lesson, Ron learned about <a href="/wiki/Thestral" title="Thestral">Thestrals</a>, magical creatures that could only be seen by wizards and witches who had witnessed death.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_6-10" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-6"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>6<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="The_attack_on_Arthur_Weasley">The attack on Arthur Weasley</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix"><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>Your dad. Your dad's... been attacked...</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Ron</b>: "<i>What?</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>Your dad! He's been bitten, it's serious, there was blood everywhere...</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Harry has a vision of Arthur Wealsey being attacked by <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/Order-of-the-phoenix-weasleys_harry.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180711140556" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Order-of-the-phoenix-weasleys harry" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Order-of-the-phoenix-weasleys harry.jpg" data-image-key="Order-of-the-phoenix-weasleys_harry.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/Order-of-the-phoenix-weasleys_harry.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180711140556"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/Order-of-the-phoenix-weasleys_harry.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180711140556" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Order-of-the-phoenix-weasleys harry" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/Order-of-the-phoenix-weasleys_harry.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180711140556" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Order-of-the-phoenix-weasleys harry.jpg" data-image-key="Order-of-the-phoenix-weasleys_harry.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/Order-of-the-phoenix-weasleys_harry.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180711140556"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Order-of-the-phoenix-weasleys_harry.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry informing the Weasleys of their father's attack at the Ministry</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Frequent Dumbledore's Army meetings, <a href="/wiki/Ordinary_Wizarding_Level" title="Ordinary Wizarding Level">O.W.L.</a> homework, and his prefect duties took up most of Ron's time as the holidays approached. Following the last meeting of the term, Ron was amazed at Harry's "romantic" tale, earning him a stern talking to from Hermione who suggested that Ron had <i>"the emotional range of a <a href="/wiki/Teaspoon" title="Teaspoon">teaspoon</a></i>". That night, Harry witnessed Ron's father, <a href="/wiki/Arthur_Weasley" title="Arthur Weasley">Arthur Weasley</a>, being attacked by Lord Voldemort's snake, <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a>. When Harry's story was confirmed by Dumbledore and McGonagall, Ron, his siblings, and Harry were immediately sent to the Order's Headquarters, so they could look in on their father's convalescence, and there they spent the <a href="/wiki/Christmas_holidays" title="Christmas holidays">Christmas holidays</a>, joined by Hermione the next day.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_6-11" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-6"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>6<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
