<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/93/DA_Luna_Fred_Ginny_George_Ron.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161217055928" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="DA Luna Fred Ginny George Ron" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="167" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="DA Luna Fred Ginny George Ron.jpg" data-image-key="DA_Luna_Fred_Ginny_George_Ron.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/93/DA_Luna_Fred_Ginny_George_Ron.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161217055928"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/93/DA_Luna_Fred_Ginny_George_Ron.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161217055928" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="DA Luna Fred Ginny George Ron" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/93/DA_Luna_Fred_Ginny_George_Ron.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161217055928" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="167" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="DA Luna Fred Ginny George Ron.jpg" data-image-key="DA_Luna_Fred_Ginny_George_Ron.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/93/DA_Luna_Fred_Ginny_George_Ron.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161217055928"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:DA_Luna_Fred_Ginny_George_Ron.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron with siblings Fred, George and Ginny practising with the <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore's Army">D.A.</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>During their first trip to <a href="/wiki/St_Mungo%27s_Hospital_for_Magical_Maladies_and_Injuries" title="St Mungo's Hospital for Magical Maladies and Injuries">St Mungo's</a> Hospital, Ron overheard "<a href="/wiki/Alastor_Moody" title="Alastor Moody">Mad Eye" Moody</a> thinking that Harry had been possessed by Voldemort. Ron was worried when Harry became quiet after the visit and wanted to talk to Harry about it. He got his chance after Hermione arrived and convinced Harry to come downstairs. Ron, Hermione, and Ginny told Harry how worried they had been and managed to confess that he was not being possessed. They had an enjoyable holiday, but on their second visit to the hospital, Ron learned the truth about the torture of <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a>'s parents.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_6-12" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-6"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>6<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/RonExpectoPatronum.gif/revision/latest?cb=20190416125024" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="RonExpectoPatronum" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="RonExpectoPatronum.gif" data-image-key="RonExpectoPatronum.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/RonExpectoPatronum.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190416125024"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/RonExpectoPatronum.gif/revision/latest?cb=20190416125024" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="RonExpectoPatronum" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/RonExpectoPatronum.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190416125024" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="RonExpectoPatronum.gif" data-image-key="RonExpectoPatronum.gif" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/c/cd/RonExpectoPatronum.gif/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190416125024"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:RonExpectoPatronum.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron conjuring his Patronus</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Throughout the term, Ron continued to learn defensive and offensive magic from Harry. He also stayed on the Gryffindor Quidditch team, despite his very poor performances. Due to Quidditch, he missed the <a href="/wiki/Valentine%27s_Day" title="Valentine's Day">Valentine's Day</a> visit to Hogsmeade. Though, he was impressed that Harry went public and hopeful that people might believe Harry when <i><a href="/wiki/The_Quibbler" title="The Quibbler">The Quibbler</a></i> came out. Soon, Umbridge managed to sack <a href="/wiki/Sybill_Trelawney" title="Sybill Trelawney">Professor Trelawney</a>, but her ability to name a replacement was pre-empted when <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a> arranged to have <a href="/wiki/Firenze" title="Firenze">Firenze</a> the Centaur teach the subject. Umbridge was affronted by this new staffing appointment.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_6-13" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-6"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>6<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span id="Marietta_Edgecombe.27s_betrayal"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Marietta_Edgecombe's_betrayal">Marietta Edgecombe's betrayal</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix"><b>Cho Chang</b>: "<i>Harry, I never dreamed Marietta would tell... She's a lovely person really. She just made a mistake... You know, her mum works for the Ministry, it's really difficult for her —</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>Ron's dad works at the Ministry too! And in case you haven't noticed, he hasn't got 'sneak' written across his face!</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Harry and Cho discussing Marietta's betrayal and Ron's loyalty<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/40/B5C29_PeevesSalutesWeasleyTwinsDeparture.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180827191528" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B5C29 PeevesSalutesWeasleyTwinsDeparture" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="91" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B5C29 PeevesSalutesWeasleyTwinsDeparture.jpg" data-image-key="B5C29_PeevesSalutesWeasleyTwinsDeparture.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/40/B5C29_PeevesSalutesWeasleyTwinsDeparture.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180827191528"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/40/B5C29_PeevesSalutesWeasleyTwinsDeparture.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180827191528" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B5C29 PeevesSalutesWeasleyTwinsDeparture" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/40/B5C29_PeevesSalutesWeasleyTwinsDeparture.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180827191528" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="91" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B5C29 PeevesSalutesWeasleyTwinsDeparture.jpg" data-image-key="B5C29_PeevesSalutesWeasleyTwinsDeparture.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/40/B5C29_PeevesSalutesWeasleyTwinsDeparture.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180827191528"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B5C29_PeevesSalutesWeasleyTwinsDeparture.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron and others watching as <a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley" title="Fred Weasley">Fred</a> and <a href="/wiki/George_Weasley" title="George Weasley">George</a> openly mocked Umbridge's authority</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Soon after Trelawney's sacking, <a href="/wiki/Marietta_Edgecombe" title="Marietta Edgecombe">Marietta Edgecombe</a>, a friend of Ravenclaw Student <a href="/wiki/Cho_Chang" title="Cho Chang">Cho Chang</a>'s who only reluctantly joined Dumbledore's Army, told Umbridge about the group, but was unable to give up any pertinent information once she saw a <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army_parchment_jinx" title="Dumbledore's Army parchment jinx">jinx</a> activate on her face. Ron was able to escape when Umbridge, raided the Dumbledore's Army headquarters, but he was incensed when <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Professor Dumbledore</a> was forced out of the school. He was also wary when his brothers Fred and George Weasley said they were going to do their part for Professor Dumbledore. After Fred and George's secret escape from Hogwarts, Ron was certain that his mother would blame him, but he was saved from this fate when Harry revealed that it was he who financed <a href="/wiki/Weasleys%27_Wizard_Wheezes" title="Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes">Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_6-14" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-6"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>6<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Ron played in the final Quidditch match of the season, though Harry and Hermione did not watch, as Hagrid finally revealed the source of his injuries to them. Ron played better, and Gryffindor won the <a href="/wiki/Inter-House_Quidditch_Cup" title="Inter-House Quidditch Cup">Quidditch Cup</a>. Ron was unable to settle to his studies the following day, but Harry and Hermione brought him down with Hagrid's secret injuries.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP_6-15" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP-6"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>6<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Battle_of_the_Department_of_Mysteries">Battle of the Department of Mysteries</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix"><b>Ron</b>: "<i>Honest, Harry, they're brains — look — Accio Brain!... Ha ha ha, Harry, look at it — Harry, come and touch it, bet it's weird —</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>RON, NO!</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Ron</b>: "<i>Harry, look what's happen — no — no, I don't like it — no, stop — stop —</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Ron being attacked by the brains in the Brain Room of the Department of Mysteries<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Order_of_the_Phoenix" title="Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/19/DA_captured_by_Umbridge.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180108180822" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="DA captured by Umbridge" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="DA captured by Umbridge.jpg" data-image-key="DA_captured_by_Umbridge.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/19/DA_captured_by_Umbridge.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180108180822"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/19/DA_captured_by_Umbridge.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180108180822" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="DA captured by Umbridge" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/19/DA_captured_by_Umbridge.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180108180822" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="DA captured by Umbridge.jpg" data-image-key="DA_captured_by_Umbridge.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/19/DA_captured_by_Umbridge.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180108180822"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:DA_captured_by_Umbridge.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron and other D.A. members being held captive by Umbridge</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Shortly thereafter, their <a href="/wiki/Ordinary_Wizarding_Level" title="Ordinary Wizarding Level">Ordinary Wizarding Level</a> exams were upon them. Ron managed to do very well, but he made a few mistakes. During their final exam, Harry dozed off and had another vision. This time, he saw Sirius being tortured by Voldemort in the Ministry. When Harry told Ron and Hermione of this they were wary, and Hermione suggested that Harry try to contact Sirius first. Ron ran off to distract Umbridge, but the plan failed, and Ron and his friends were rounded up and taken to Umbridge's office. There, Ron, Ginny, Neville, and Luna Lovegood managed to fight off Umbridge and her Slytherin Guards and escape to find Harry and Hermione outside the forest.
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/98/OOTP_Death_Chamber_trio_Ginny_Neville_Luna.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140912125022" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="OOTP Death Chamber trio Ginny Neville Luna" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="120" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="OOTP Death Chamber trio Ginny Neville Luna.gif" data-image-key="OOTP_Death_Chamber_trio_Ginny_Neville_Luna.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/98/OOTP_Death_Chamber_trio_Ginny_Neville_Luna.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140912125022"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/98/OOTP_Death_Chamber_trio_Ginny_Neville_Luna.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140912125022" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="OOTP Death Chamber trio Ginny Neville Luna" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/98/OOTP_Death_Chamber_trio_Ginny_Neville_Luna.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140912125022" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="120" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="OOTP Death Chamber trio Ginny Neville Luna.gif" data-image-key="OOTP_Death_Chamber_trio_Ginny_Neville_Luna.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/9/98/OOTP_Death_Chamber_trio_Ginny_Neville_Luna.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140912125022"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:OOTP_Death_Chamber_trio_Ginny_Neville_Luna.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron, <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna</a>, <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville</a>, <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry</a>, <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny</a> in the Death Chamber</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Ron insisted that he join Harry in rescuing Sirius, but also insisted that the rest remain behind, but realised when many Thestrals appeared. When Harry led them into the <a href="/wiki/Department_of_Mysteries" title="Department of Mysteries">Department of Mysteries</a>, Ron stuck with him into the deepest recesses of the Department. There, the six Dumbledore's Army members were ambushed by twelve <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a>, led by wizarding aristocrat <a href="/wiki/Lucius_Malfoy" title="Lucius Malfoy">Lucius Malfoy</a>, and Ron helped defend the prophecy Harry took from the <a href="/wiki/Hall_of_Prophecy" title="Hall of Prophecy">Hall of Prophecy</a>, but his fight was soon over when a Death Eater used a spell to wipe his brains. Ron was so confused that he summoned a tentacled-brain from a vat in the <a href="/wiki/Brain_Room" title="Brain Room">Brain Room</a> and was attacked by it, but soon recovered later on. Ron was devastated by <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius</a>'s death, but made sure that it was not discussed around Harry.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Sixth_year">Sixth year</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince"><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>You said to us once before that there was time to turn back if we wanted to. We've had time, haven't we?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Ron</b>: "<i>We're with you, whatever happens.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— A commit to Harry and his <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore_and_Harry_Potter%27s_Horcrux_Hunt" class="mw-redirect" title="Albus Dumbledore and Harry Potter's Horcrux Hunt">Horcrux hunt</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p>During the summer following the battle, Ron learned he had received seven <a href="/wiki/Ordinary_Wizarding_Level" title="Ordinary Wizarding Level">O.W.L.s</a>, only failing <a href="/wiki/Divination" title="Divination">Divination</a> and <a href="/wiki/History_of_Magic" title="History of Magic">History of Magic</a>. Ron explained he did not mind, as he, like Harry, didn't like those subjects very much, anyway. Also during that summer, Ron learned that his brother Bill was engaged to <a href="/wiki/Fleur_Delacour" title="Fleur Delacour">Fleur Delacour</a>. While this annoyed his mother, sister, and later Hermione, Ron took to defending Fleur and if she surprised him, he would still take on that dumbstruck look. His soft spot for Fleur particularly annoyed Hermione, who was finding it harder to keep her feelings for him under wraps.
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7b/B6C6M1_inside_Weasleys%27_Wizard_Wheezes.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161210162837" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B6C6M1 inside Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B6C6M1 inside Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes.jpg" data-image-key="B6C6M1_inside_Weasleys%27_Wizard_Wheezes.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7b/B6C6M1_inside_Weasleys%27_Wizard_Wheezes.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161210162837"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7b/B6C6M1_inside_Weasleys%27_Wizard_Wheezes.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161210162837" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B6C6M1 inside Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7b/B6C6M1_inside_Weasleys%27_Wizard_Wheezes.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161210162837" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B6C6M1 inside Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes.jpg" data-image-key="B6C6M1_inside_Weasleys%27_Wizard_Wheezes.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7b/B6C6M1_inside_Weasleys%27_Wizard_Wheezes.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161210162837"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B6C6M1_inside_Weasleys%27_Wizard_Wheezes.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron and others visiting Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>When Ron and Hermione learned that <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter" title="Harry Potter">Harry</a> was, in fact, the "Chosen One", Ron remained at Harry's side.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_8-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-8"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>8<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Ron, Hermione, Harry, Ginny, Molly, and Arthur also visited the twins shop Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes. Ron was impressed with the shop and the twins' flair for business. He attempted to take some products but was told to put them back after he revealed he had no currency. The trio also followed Draco Malfoy and learned that he wanted something repaired and that he put something else on hold.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="A_rough_start">A rough start</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince"><b>Cormac McLaggen</b>: "<i>Give me another go.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>No. You've had your go. You saved four. Ron saved five. Ron's Keeper, he won it fair and square.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Ron becoming Gryffindor's Keeper<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/30/Harry-potter-half-blood-ron_tryouts.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180720145922" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter-half-blood-ron tryouts" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter-half-blood-ron tryouts.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-half-blood-ron_tryouts.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/30/Harry-potter-half-blood-ron_tryouts.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180720145922"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/30/Harry-potter-half-blood-ron_tryouts.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180720145922" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter-half-blood-ron tryouts" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/30/Harry-potter-half-blood-ron_tryouts.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180720145922" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter-half-blood-ron tryouts.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter-half-blood-ron_tryouts.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/30/Harry-potter-half-blood-ron_tryouts.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180720145922"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter-half-blood-ron_tryouts.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron trying out as <a href="/wiki/Keeper" title="Keeper">Keeper</a> for the Gryffindor Quidditch team</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Ron would suffer much personal turmoil in his sixth year. Harry was named <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor</a> team <a href="/wiki/Quidditch_Captain" title="Quidditch Captain">captain</a>. Ron was nervous about Quidditch try-outs but beat out <a href="/wiki/Cormac_McLaggen" title="Cormac McLaggen">Cormac McLaggen</a> in saves, partly because Hermione cast a <a href="/wiki/Confundus_Charm" title="Confundus Charm">Confundus Charm</a> on McLaggen in retaliation for him insulting Ron and Ginny. He was also envious when Harry and Hermione were invited to the <a href="/wiki/Slug_Club" title="Slug Club">Slug Club</a>, while the new <a href="/wiki/Potions_(class)" title="Potions (class)">Potions</a> professor <a href="/wiki/Horace_Slughorn" title="Horace Slughorn">Horace Slughorn</a> ignored him, and when attention was paid to him, Slughorn usually got his name wrong.
</p><p>During this time, Ron showed brief flashes of jealousy about Harry and Hermione's closeness. He would take exception whenever Hermione complimented Harry on something Ron thought was equally due to him. Ron was temporarily mollified about this when <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a> asked if he would like to attend the club's Christmas party with her, and he agreed but thought it was only as friends.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_8-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-8"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>8<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b6/Ron_Keeper.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160513202125" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ron Keeper" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Ron Keeper.jpg" data-image-key="Ron_Keeper.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b6/Ron_Keeper.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160513202125"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b6/Ron_Keeper.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160513202125" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ron Keeper" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b6/Ron_Keeper.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160513202125" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Ron Keeper.jpg" data-image-key="Ron_Keeper.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b6/Ron_Keeper.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160513202125"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Ron_Keeper.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron playing as Keeper against Slytherin in the first match of the year</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Ron was also worried over his sister's increasing involvement with boys, and after stumbling upon her kissing <a href="/wiki/Dean_Thomas" title="Dean Thomas">Dean Thomas</a>, he blew up at her. In retaliation, Ginny belittled him for his complete inexperience with the opposite gender, declaring that Harry and Hermione had also snogged people. The siblings treated each other coldly afterwards, and Ron was so bothered by this — and by the revelation that Hermione had kissed Viktor Krum almost two years earlier — that he became touchy and his temper became volatile, and he even began to perform poorly in Quidditch training. In the last training session before the match against Slytherin, he snapped at his teammate, newcomer <a href="/wiki/Demelza_Robins" title="Demelza Robins">Demelza Robins</a>, and Harry was forced to intervene, threatening to kick him out of the team if he kept acting like this.
</p><p>He also began to treat Hermione with a cold indifference, which confused her. He even offered to resign from the team. To boost his confidence, Harry pretended to pour the <a href="/wiki/Felix_Felicis" title="Felix Felicis">Felix Felicis</a> into Ron's <a href="/wiki/Pumpkin_juice" title="Pumpkin juice">Pumpkin juice</a> at breakfast. Harry even allowed Hermione to see the vial, so she would object to the cheating. This convinced Ron that he had an edge in the game, which caused him to play excellently. However, when after the match Harry revealed it was a trick, Ron rounded on Hermione and accused her of having no faith in his abilities.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_8-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-8"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>8<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Dating_Lavender_Brown">Dating Lavender Brown</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince"><b>Ron Weasley</b>: "<i>Well... we don't really talk much. It's mainly...</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>Snogging.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley</b>: "<i>Well, yeah.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Ron's shallow relationship with Lavender Brown<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3e/Lavender_and_Ron_at_Hogwarts_HBPF.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160905035447" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Lavender and Ron at Hogwarts HBPF" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="121" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Lavender and Ron at Hogwarts HBPF.jpg" data-image-key="Lavender_and_Ron_at_Hogwarts_HBPF.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3e/Lavender_and_Ron_at_Hogwarts_HBPF.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160905035447"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3e/Lavender_and_Ron_at_Hogwarts_HBPF.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160905035447" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Lavender and Ron at Hogwarts HBPF" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3e/Lavender_and_Ron_at_Hogwarts_HBPF.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160905035447" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="121" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Lavender and Ron at Hogwarts HBPF.jpg" data-image-key="Lavender_and_Ron_at_Hogwarts_HBPF.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3e/Lavender_and_Ron_at_Hogwarts_HBPF.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160905035447"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Lavender_and_Ron_at_Hogwarts_HBPF.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron dating classmate Lavender Brown</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Shortly thereafter, Ron began his exhibitionist relationship with <a href="/wiki/Lavender_Brown" title="Lavender Brown">Lavender Brown</a>. Hermione, incredibly angry and hurt by Ron's vindictive actions, conjured a flock of canaries to <a href="/wiki/Oppugno_Jinx" title="Oppugno Jinx">attack</a> him; the birds scratched Ron badly. Although he did not report this, he spent a long time ranting about her violent and hypocritical act, and he and Hermione stopped talking to each other after that. When Hermione attended the Slug Club's Christmas party, she had originally wanted to attend with Ron but went with his hated rival, <a href="/wiki/Cormac_McLaggen" title="Cormac McLaggen">Cormac McLaggen</a>, while Ron snogged Lavender in public and made fun of Hermione's behaviour in <a href="/wiki/Transfiguration_(class)" title="Transfiguration (class)">Transfiguration</a> class, reducing her to tears.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_8-4" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-8"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>8<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>By Christmas break, however, Ron was becoming disenchanted with his relationship with Lavender, who had become increasingly possessive, annoyed him with the nickname "<i>Won-Won</i>", and gave him a gift of a necklace that said "<i>My Sweetheart</i>". Hermione did not come to <a href="/wiki/The_Burrow" title="The Burrow">The Burrow</a> for the holidays as she usually did, and Ron made an attempt to speak to her after returning to school, but she ignored him.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_8-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-8"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>8<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Poisoned_twice">Poisoned twice</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-blood Prince">"<i>Hermione gave an almost inaudible sniff. She had been exceptionally quiet all day. Having hurtled, white-faced, up to Harry outside the hospital wing and demanded to know what had happened, she had taken almost no part in Harry and <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny</a>'s obsessive discussion about how Ron had been poisoned, but merely stood beside them, clench-jawed and frightened-looking, until at last they had been allowed in to see him.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Hermione visiting Ron in the hospital after he was poisoned<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-blood_Prince" class="mw-redirect" title="Harry Potter and the Half-blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/39/Harry_Potter_saving_a_poisoned_Ronald_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180720144619" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry Potter saving a poisoned Ronald Weasley" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry Potter saving a poisoned Ronald Weasley.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Potter_saving_a_poisoned_Ronald_Weasley.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/39/Harry_Potter_saving_a_poisoned_Ronald_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180720144619"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/39/Harry_Potter_saving_a_poisoned_Ronald_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180720144619" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry Potter saving a poisoned Ronald Weasley" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/39/Harry_Potter_saving_a_poisoned_Ronald_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180720144619" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry Potter saving a poisoned Ronald Weasley.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Potter_saving_a_poisoned_Ronald_Weasley.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/39/Harry_Potter_saving_a_poisoned_Ronald_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180720144619"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_Potter_saving_a_poisoned_Ronald_Weasley.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron having a fit after ingesting the poisoned mead</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>On <a href="/wiki/1_March" title="1 March">1 March</a> <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a>, Ron ate chocolate that he believed to be one of the presents for <a href="/wiki/Ronald_Weasley%27s_seventeenth_birthday" title="Ronald Weasley's seventeenth birthday">his 17th birthday</a> but was, in fact, a gift from <a href="/wiki/Romilda_Vane" title="Romilda Vane">Romilda Vane</a> to Harry spiked with a <a href="/wiki/Amortentia" title="Amortentia">love potion</a>. He found the box on the floor after Harry had chucked it out of his trunk, and thought it was a part of his pile of presents by the foot of his bed. Upon ingesting the chocolate, Ron became maddened with an obsessive need to see and be with Romilda. Harry, thinking fast, proceeded to take Ron to Slughorn's office to get an antidote. When in Slughorn's office, while Harry attempted to get Slughorn in a good mood hoping to get the true memory from him, Ron was nearly killed by poisoned mead intended for <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore</a>. Harry managed to save Ron with a <a href="/wiki/Bezoar" title="Bezoar">bezoar</a>. The bezoar was one Slughorn had in his kit taken from a previous potions lesson. If it wasn't for Harry's timely actions and quick thinking, Ron would have died.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP18_39-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP18-39"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>39<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3d/Poppy_Pomfrey_-_Ron_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160830010138" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Poppy Pomfrey - Ron Weasley" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="117" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Poppy Pomfrey - Ron Weasley.jpg" data-image-key="Poppy_Pomfrey_-_Ron_Weasley.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3d/Poppy_Pomfrey_-_Ron_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160830010138"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3d/Poppy_Pomfrey_-_Ron_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160830010138" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Poppy Pomfrey - Ron Weasley" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3d/Poppy_Pomfrey_-_Ron_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160830010138" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="117" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Poppy Pomfrey - Ron Weasley.jpg" data-image-key="Poppy_Pomfrey_-_Ron_Weasley.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/3d/Poppy_Pomfrey_-_Ron_Weasley.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160830010138"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Poppy_Pomfrey_-_Ron_Weasley.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">A poisoned Ron being attended by <a href="/wiki/Poppy_Pomfrey" title="Poppy Pomfrey">Madam Pomfrey</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>A panic-stricken Hermione arrived at the <a href="/wiki/Hospital_Wing" title="Hospital Wing">Hospital Wing</a>, forgetting her anger with him. Ron said Hermione's name in his sleep upon hearing her speak for the first time all day, and the two quietly reconciled after his near-death experience. Ron also took to feigning sleep whenever Lavender tried to visit him. He remained in the hospital the following week and was not able to play Keeper on Saturday <a href="/wiki/8_March" title="8 March">8 March</a> for the <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor_vs_Hufflepuff_Quidditch_match_(1997)" title="Gryffindor vs Hufflepuff Quidditch match (1997)">Gryffindor vs Hufflepuff Quidditch match</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP19_40-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP19-40"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>40<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Re-embracing_friends">Re-embracing friends</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-blood Prince"><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>Fifty-seventh time lucky, you think?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Ron</b>: "<i>Lucky. Harry, that's it — get lucky!</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>What d'you mean?</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Ron</b>: "<i>Use your lucky potion!</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Ron suggesting using Felix Felicis to retrieve the true memory from Slughorn<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-blood_Prince" class="mw-redirect" title="Harry Potter and the Half-blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<p>On Monday <a href="/wiki/10_March" title="10 March">10 March</a> Ron and Harry, who suffered a cracked skull from a mishit <a href="/wiki/Bludger" title="Bludger">Bludger</a> during the match, were able to leave the hospital wing, although Ron did not tell Lavender this.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP20_41-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP20-41"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>41<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> His subsequent avoidance of Lavender and simultaneous spending more time with Hermione made Lavender suspicious; after she spotted him and Hermione leaving the boys' dormitories, seemingly alone (Harry was with them, but under his <a href="/wiki/Cloak_of_Invisibility" title="Cloak of Invisibility">Cloak of Invisibility</a>), Lavender ended the relationship, much to Ron's relief.
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/Harry_Potter_got_the_idea_of_Two_Vanishing_Cabinets_after_passing_the_Carrow_twins.JPG/revision/latest?cb=20091214022836" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry Potter got the idea of Two Vanishing Cabinets after passing the Carrow twins" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="166" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry Potter got the idea of Two Vanishing Cabinets after passing the Carrow twins.JPG" data-image-key="Harry_Potter_got_the_idea_of_Two_Vanishing_Cabinets_after_passing_the_Carrow_twins.JPG" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/Harry_Potter_got_the_idea_of_Two_Vanishing_Cabinets_after_passing_the_Carrow_twins.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20091214022836"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/Harry_Potter_got_the_idea_of_Two_Vanishing_Cabinets_after_passing_the_Carrow_twins.JPG/revision/latest?cb=20091214022836" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry Potter got the idea of Two Vanishing Cabinets after passing the Carrow twins" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/Harry_Potter_got_the_idea_of_Two_Vanishing_Cabinets_after_passing_the_Carrow_twins.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20091214022836" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="166" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry Potter got the idea of Two Vanishing Cabinets after passing the Carrow twins.JPG" data-image-key="Harry_Potter_got_the_idea_of_Two_Vanishing_Cabinets_after_passing_the_Carrow_twins.JPG" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1b/Harry_Potter_got_the_idea_of_Two_Vanishing_Cabinets_after_passing_the_Carrow_twins.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20091214022836"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_Potter_got_the_idea_of_Two_Vanishing_Cabinets_after_passing_the_Carrow_twins.JPG" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron suggesting that Harry use <a href="/wiki/Felix_Felicis" title="Felix Felicis">Felix Felicis</a> to retrieve the memory</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Ron also had the idea of using Felix Felicis to retrieve Slughorn's true memory, while he and Hermione were preparing for their <a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">Apparition</a> test. A little later, Ron was suitably impressed when Harry told him and Hermione how he managed to obtain the Horcrux memory from Professor Slughorn. A few weeks later, when Harry used <i><a href="/wiki/Laceration_Curse" title="Laceration Curse">Sectumsempra</a></i> on <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Draco Malfoy</a>, Ron lent his potions book to Harry so <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Professor Snape</a> would not confiscate the Half-Blood Prince's book.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_8-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-8"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>8<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Ron did not endorse what Harry did to Malfoy, but he did not consider it that bad. He took this stance because Malfoy healed okay and did not sustain any lasting damage. Ron also understood why Harry wanted the Half-Blood Prince's book back.
</p>
<h5><span class="mw-headline" id="Battle_of_the_Astronomy_Tower">Battle of the Astronomy Tower</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h5>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">"<i>I messed up, Harry. We did like you told us: we checked the Marauder's Map and we couldn't see Malfoy on it, so we thought he must be in the Room of Requirement, so me, Ginny and Neville went to keep watch on it... but Malfoy got past us.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Ron participating in the Battle of the Astronomy Tower<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Half-Blood_Prince" title="Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/B6C30M1_funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest?cb=20161209004341" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B6C30M1 funeral of Albus Dumbledore" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B6C30M1 funeral of Albus Dumbledore.png" data-image-key="B6C30M1_funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/B6C30M1_funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161209004341"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/B6C30M1_funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest?cb=20161209004341" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B6C30M1 funeral of Albus Dumbledore" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/B6C30M1_funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161209004341" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B6C30M1 funeral of Albus Dumbledore.png" data-image-key="B6C30M1_funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/06/B6C30M1_funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161209004341"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B6C30M1_funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The <a href="/wiki/Funeral_of_Albus_Dumbledore" title="Funeral of Albus Dumbledore">funeral of Albus Dumbledore</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>On the night of the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Astronomy_Tower" title="Battle of the Astronomy Tower">Battle of the Astronomy Tower</a>, Ron took Felix Felicis on Harry's instructions, along with Hermione and Ginny. Those three were joined by <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a> and <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna Lovegood</a>, whom Hermione had summoned using the <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army_coin" title="Dumbledore's Army coin">D.A. coins</a>. While Hermione and Luna monitored Professor Snape's office, Ron and the others watched the <a href="/wiki/Room_of_Requirement" title="Room of Requirement">Room of Requirement</a>. Ron fought in the battle and survived without any major injuries, thanks to the Felix Felicis.
</p><p>He was shaken by his oldest brother <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill</a>'s scarring at the hands of the vicious <a href="/wiki/Werewolf" title="Werewolf">werewolf</a> <a href="/wiki/Fenrir_Greyback" title="Fenrir Greyback">Fenrir Greyback</a>. Shortly afterwards, Ron attended the funeral of Albus Dumbledore, where he comforted a sobbing Hermione. He and Hermione informed Harry of their intention to accompany him on a quest to locate and destroy the <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcruxes</a> of Lord Voldemort, forgoing their seventh year of school.<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_8-7" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-8"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>8<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h3><span id="Horcrux_hunt_.281997.E2.80.931998.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Horcrux_hunt_(1997–1998)">Horcrux hunt <span class="template-c">(1997–1998)</span></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Harry</b>: "<i>If you think I'm going to let six people risk their lives — !</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Ron</b>: "<i>—because it's the first time for all of us.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— An argument over the seven Potters plan<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/59/The_Ghoul_in_Pyjamas.png/revision/latest?cb=20170204082727" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="The Ghoul in Pyjamas" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="132" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="The Ghoul in Pyjamas.png" data-image-key="The_Ghoul_in_Pyjamas.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/59/The_Ghoul_in_Pyjamas.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170204082727"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/59/The_Ghoul_in_Pyjamas.png/revision/latest?cb=20170204082727" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="The Ghoul in Pyjamas" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/59/The_Ghoul_in_Pyjamas.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170204082727" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="132" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="The Ghoul in Pyjamas.png" data-image-key="The_Ghoul_in_Pyjamas.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/59/The_Ghoul_in_Pyjamas.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170204082727"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:The_Ghoul_in_Pyjamas.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The Weasley's <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family_ghoul" title="Weasley family ghoul">ghoul</a> transfigured and sick looking</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>During the summer of 1997, Ron began planning ahead for his mission with Harry and Hermione. With the help of <a href="/wiki/Arthur_Weasley" title="Arthur Weasley">his father</a> and Fred and George Weasley, Ron <a href="/wiki/Transfiguration" title="Transfiguration">transfigured</a> the <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family_ghoul" title="Weasley family ghoul">family ghoul</a> to resemble himself sick with <a href="/wiki/Spattergroit" title="Spattergroit">spattergroit</a>, which would serve as his alibi for not attending his seventh year of Hogwarts while travelling with his friends.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_11-5" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Mrs Weasley was unware of this plan, as she was in denial about the trio's plans to drop out of Hogwarts.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Battle_of_the_Seven_Potters">Battle of the Seven Potters</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>Ron was great. Wonderful. Stunned one of the Death Eaters, straight to the head, and when you're aiming at a moving target from a flying broom —</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Ron's helpfulness during the battle<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/B7C4M1_Seven_Potters_depart.png/revision/latest?cb=20170106051900" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B7C4M1 Seven Potters depart" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B7C4M1 Seven Potters depart.png" data-image-key="B7C4M1_Seven_Potters_depart.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/B7C4M1_Seven_Potters_depart.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170106051900"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/B7C4M1_Seven_Potters_depart.png/revision/latest?cb=20170106051900" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B7C4M1 Seven Potters depart" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/B7C4M1_Seven_Potters_depart.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170106051900" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B7C4M1 Seven Potters depart.png" data-image-key="B7C4M1_Seven_Potters_depart.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/bc/B7C4M1_Seven_Potters_depart.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20170106051900"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B7C4M1_Seven_Potters_depart.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The seven Harrys and their protectors preparing to take off</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>In late July, he participated in the Order's operation to remove Harry from his childhood home, taking <a href="/wiki/Polyjuice_Potion" title="Polyjuice Potion">Polyjuice Potion</a> to be one of the "<i>seven Potters</i>." He flew with Nymphadora Tonks; they were pursued by at least three Death Eaters during the battle, including <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix</a> and <a href="/wiki/Rodolphus_Lestrange_(II)" title="Rodolphus Lestrange (II)">Rodolphus Lestrange</a>. Ron stunned one of the <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> in the face while flying. Ron reassured Hermione by nuzzling her back slightly upon landing as she had been quite worried about him and he was saddened at the death of <a href="/wiki/Alastor_Moody" title="Alastor Moody">"Mad-Eye" Moody</a>. He was also saddened by the death of Harry's beloved pet owl <a href="/wiki/Hedwig" title="Hedwig">Hedwig</a>, over which he comforted Harry. Ron became concerned when Harry had a vision of an imprisoned <a href="/wiki/Garrick_Ollivander" title="Garrick Ollivander">Garrick Ollivander</a> being brutally tortured by Lord Voldemort in the cellar at Malfoy Manor.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_11-6" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/DH1_HQ_still_Scrimgeour_Trio.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190128225544" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="DH1 HQ still Scrimgeour Trio" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="167" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="DH1 HQ still Scrimgeour Trio.jpg" data-image-key="DH1_HQ_still_Scrimgeour_Trio.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/DH1_HQ_still_Scrimgeour_Trio.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190128225544"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/DH1_HQ_still_Scrimgeour_Trio.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190128225544" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="DH1 HQ still Scrimgeour Trio" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/DH1_HQ_still_Scrimgeour_Trio.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190128225544" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="167" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="DH1 HQ still Scrimgeour Trio.jpg" data-image-key="DH1_HQ_still_Scrimgeour_Trio.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7a/DH1_HQ_still_Scrimgeour_Trio.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190128225544"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:DH1_HQ_still_Scrimgeour_Trio.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron, Harry, and Hermione during the reading of <a href="/wiki/The_Last_Will_and_Testament_of_Albus_Percival_Wulfric_Brian_Dumbledore" title="The Last Will and Testament of Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore">Albus Dumbledore's will</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Once Ron, Harry, and Hermione were all convened at <a href="/wiki/The_Burrow" title="The Burrow">The Burrow</a>, they made plans to leave, much to the displeasure of Ron's worried mother. During the preparations for Bill's wedding, Mrs Weasley set Ron, Harry, and Hermione to separate tasks to prevent them from planning. On Harry's seventeenth birthday, Ron gave Harry a copy of <i><a href="/wiki/Twelve_Fail-Safe_Ways_to_Charm_Witches" title="Twelve Fail-Safe Ways to Charm Witches">Twelve Fail-Safe Ways to Charm Witches</a></i>. Later that evening, <a href="/wiki/Minister_for_Magic" title="Minister for Magic">Minister for Magic</a> <a href="/wiki/Rufus_Scrimgeour" title="Rufus Scrimgeour">Rufus Scrimgeour</a> visited The Burrow to dispense the contents of Dumbledore's will. He questioned the trio, and Ron let slip that they had no idea why <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore" title="Albus Dumbledore">Dumbledore</a> would bequeath anything to him. Ron received Dumbledore's <a href="/wiki/Deluminator" title="Deluminator">Deluminator</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_11-7" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Escape_from_The_Burrow">Escape from The Burrow</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Ron </b>: "<i>You know, we're not far from the <a href="/wiki/Leaky_Cauldron" title="Leaky Cauldron">Leaky Cauldron</a> here, it's only in Charing Cross —</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>Ron, we can't!</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Ron </b>: "<i>Not to stay there, but to find out what's going on!</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>We know what's going on! Voldemort's taken over the Ministry, what else do we need to know?</i>"</dd>
<dd>— The trio looking for a safe place to stay after escaping The Burrow<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/B7C8M1_Wedding_of_William_Weasley_and_Fleur_Delacour.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161216052837" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B7C8M1 Wedding of William Weasley and Fleur Delacour" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B7C8M1 Wedding of William Weasley and Fleur Delacour.jpg" data-image-key="B7C8M1_Wedding_of_William_Weasley_and_Fleur_Delacour.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/B7C8M1_Wedding_of_William_Weasley_and_Fleur_Delacour.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161216052837"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/B7C8M1_Wedding_of_William_Weasley_and_Fleur_Delacour.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161216052837" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B7C8M1 Wedding of William Weasley and Fleur Delacour" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/B7C8M1_Wedding_of_William_Weasley_and_Fleur_Delacour.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161216052837" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B7C8M1 Wedding of William Weasley and Fleur Delacour.jpg" data-image-key="B7C8M1_Wedding_of_William_Weasley_and_Fleur_Delacour.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/a/a2/B7C8M1_Wedding_of_William_Weasley_and_Fleur_Delacour.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161216052837"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B7C8M1_Wedding_of_William_Weasley_and_Fleur_Delacour.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Kingsley_Shacklebolt" title="Kingsley Shacklebolt">Kingsley</a> warning the wedding attendees that the Ministry had fallen</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The trio attended the wedding for which, all summer, they had been forced to prepare <a href="/wiki/The_Burrow" title="The Burrow">The Burrow</a>; the marrying couple was Ron's older brother <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill</a> to <a href="/wiki/Fleur_Delacour" title="Fleur Delacour">Fleur Delacour</a> on 1 August. Ron was irked and jealous that <a href="/wiki/Viktor_Krum" title="Viktor Krum">Viktor Krum</a> was a guest, especially since he immediately complimented Hermione, who Ron quickly asked to dance shortly afterwards. When Viktor Krum asked who he thought was Barny Weasley (though it was really Harry in disguise) about the pair, he was somewhat disappointed to learn that they were "<i>sort of</i>" together, but not officially a couple.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_11-8" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b0/Ron_stupefy.JPG/revision/latest?cb=20110406000135" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ron stupefy" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Ron stupefy.JPG" data-image-key="Ron_stupefy.JPG" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b0/Ron_stupefy.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20110406000135"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b0/Ron_stupefy.JPG/revision/latest?cb=20110406000135" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ron stupefy" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b0/Ron_stupefy.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20110406000135" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Ron stupefy.JPG" data-image-key="Ron_stupefy.JPG" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b0/Ron_stupefy.JPG/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20110406000135"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Ron_stupefy.JPG" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron casting a <a href="/wiki/Stunning_Spell" title="Stunning Spell">Stunning Spell</a> in the café while battling Death Eaters</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The celebrations were interrupted with the news that the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a> had fallen to Voldemort, and Hermione Disapparated herself, Ron, and Harry away from the danger to <a href="/wiki/Tottenham_Court_Road" title="Tottenham Court Road">Tottenham Court Road</a>. This was the starting point to the trio's adventure and search for the Horcruxes they needed to bring down Lord Voldemort. After they arrived at Luchino café they were ambushed by <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> <a href="/wiki/Antonin_Dolohov" title="Antonin Dolohov">Antonin Dolohov</a> and <a href="/wiki/Thorfinn_Rowle" title="Thorfinn Rowle">Thorfinn Rowle</a> there and a skirmish broke out. After stunning and wiping the memories of the Death Eaters, the trio took refuge in Harry's inherited house <a href="/wiki/12_Grimmauld_Place" title="12 Grimmauld Place">12 Grimmauld Place</a> left to him by <a href="/wiki/Sirius_Black" title="Sirius Black">Sirius Black</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_11-9" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Infiltration_of_the_Ministry_of_Magic">Infiltration of the Ministry of Magic</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Ron</b>: "<i>Dad said everyone from Magical Maintenance wears navy blue robes.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>But you never told us that!</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Discussion of the Ministry infiltration plan<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2b/DH1_HQ_still_Catching_the_crook.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190128092906" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="DH1 HQ still Catching the crook" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="128" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="DH1 HQ still Catching the crook.jpg" data-image-key="DH1_HQ_still_Catching_the_crook.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2b/DH1_HQ_still_Catching_the_crook.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190128092906"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2b/DH1_HQ_still_Catching_the_crook.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190128092906" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="DH1 HQ still Catching the crook" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2b/DH1_HQ_still_Catching_the_crook.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190128092906" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="128" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="DH1 HQ still Catching the crook.jpg" data-image-key="DH1_HQ_still_Catching_the_crook.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2b/DH1_HQ_still_Catching_the_crook.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20190128092906"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:DH1_HQ_still_Catching_the_crook.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Mundungus_Fletcher" title="Mundungus Fletcher">Mundungus</a> talking to the trio about the Horcrux locket</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>There, the trio learned from <a href="/wiki/Kreacher" title="Kreacher">Kreacher</a> that <a href="/wiki/Regulus_Black" title="Regulus Black">Regulus Black</a> had stolen the Horcrux Voldemort had made of <a href="/wiki/Slytherin%27s_Locket" title="Slytherin's Locket">Slytherin's Locket</a> in 1979, and that it had been stolen from 12 Grimmauld Place by Mundungus Fletcher. Under interrogation, he informed them that the locket was now in the possession of <a href="/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge" title="Dolores Umbridge">Dolores Umbridge</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_11-10" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>While they were waiting for Kreacher to fetch Mundungus, they were visited by <a href="/wiki/Remus_Lupin" title="Remus Lupin">Remus Lupin</a>. He informed the trio about the goings on in the wider wizarding world. He told them that Harry was now the most wanted wizard in Britain and that <a href="/wiki/Muggle-born" title="Muggle-born">Muggle-born</a> witches and wizards were being rounded up. Ron immediately said that he would vouch for Hermione.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_11-11" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/54/Infiltration.png/revision/latest?cb=20210220183308" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Infiltration" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="99" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Infiltration.png" data-image-key="Infiltration.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/54/Infiltration.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20210220183308"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/54/Infiltration.png/revision/latest?cb=20210220183308" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Infiltration" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/54/Infiltration.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20210220183308" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="99" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Infiltration.png" data-image-key="Infiltration.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/54/Infiltration.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20210220183308"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Infiltration.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio disguised during their infiltration of the ministry, Ron being on the far right</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>They formulated a plan to <a href="/wiki/Infiltration_of_the_Ministry_of_Magic_(disambiguation)" class="mw-disambig" title="Infiltration of the Ministry of Magic (disambiguation)">infiltrate the Ministry</a>, involving the use of <a href="/wiki/Polyjuice_Potion" title="Polyjuice Potion">Polyjuice Potion</a> to assume the forms of Ministry employees Reginald Cattermole, Albert Runcorn and Mafalda Hopkirk. Ron, disguised as <a href="/wiki/Reginald_Cattermole" title="Reginald Cattermole">Reginald Cattermole</a>, quickly found himself forced to separate from his friends, as Death Eater and new head of the <a href="/wiki/Department_of_Magical_Law_Enforcement" title="Department of Magical Law Enforcement">Department of Magical Law Enforcement</a>, <a href="/wiki/Corban_Yaxley" title="Corban Yaxley">Yaxley</a>, demanded that "Cattermole" fix the rain in his office.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_11-12" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Ron was in over his head, but may have found a solution to the problem after asking Arthur, who had no idea of Ron's true identity, for help. The trio reunited after Harry and Hermione stole the locket from Umbridge and freed some Muggle-born witches and wizards being held by the <a href="/wiki/Muggle-Born_Registration_Commission" title="Muggle-Born Registration Commission">Muggle-Born Registration Commission</a>, and then escaped, but were forced to abandon Grimmauld Place as a hideout. Ron splinched himself during their escape into the countryside and was weakened by his injury. After receiving some treatment from Hermione, Ron fretted over the fate of the Cattermoles.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_11-13" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Exit_and_homecoming">Exit and homecoming</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>So why are you still here?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley</b>: "<i>Search me.</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Harry Potter</b>: "<i>Go home then</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Ron Weasley</b>: "<i>Yeah, maybe I will! Didn't you hear what they said about my sister? But you don't give a rat's fart, do you, it's only the Forbidden Forest, Harry I've-Faced-Worse Potter doesn't care what happens to her in here, well, I do, all right, giant spiders and mental stuff –</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Ron lashing out against Harry resulting in a violent and aggressive row<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1d/Harry_and_Ron_arguing.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140620222047" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry and Ron arguing" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="106" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry and Ron arguing.gif" data-image-key="Harry_and_Ron_arguing.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1d/Harry_and_Ron_arguing.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140620222047"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1d/Harry_and_Ron_arguing.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140620222047" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry and Ron arguing" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1d/Harry_and_Ron_arguing.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140620222047" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="106" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry and Ron arguing.gif" data-image-key="Harry_and_Ron_arguing.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/1/1d/Harry_and_Ron_arguing.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140620222047"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_and_Ron_arguing.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron and Harry fighting right before Ron abandoned the <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcrux</a> hunt</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Afterward, weeks passed with no further progress. This, as well as the locket's negative influence, caused great tension and animosity amongst the group of friends. When he wore the locket, Ron was sullen and suspicious, lashing out at his friends and continuously complaining. Ron abruptly abandoned his friends one evening after getting into a ferocious and savage fight with Harry over the additional task of locating <a href="/wiki/Sword_of_Gryffindor" title="Sword of Gryffindor">Godric Gryffindor's Sword</a> in order to destroy the locket. He accused Harry of having no plan and of not being very concerned about <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny</a>, whom they had learned was punished back at <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_School_of_Witchcraft_and_Wizardry" title="Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry">Hogwarts</a>.
</p><p>In response, Harry screamed at Ron to go. When Ron asked if Hermione was going with him and she told him that she was staying, he accused her of choosing Harry over him, and left, despite Hermione screaming and crying for him to come back.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_11-14" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>As soon as he was outside the influence of the Horcrux, Ron came to his senses and tried to return. However, he had a run-in with <a href="/wiki/Snatchers" title="Snatchers">Snatchers</a> first, who interrogated him. Ron claimed to be <a href="/wiki/Stanley_Shunpike" title="Stanley Shunpike">Stan Shunpike</a> and then took an opportunity to escape. He apparated numerous times to try to find Harry and Hermione, splinching fingernails off at one point, but could not find them. He then went to stay with Bill and Fleur at their new home, <a href="/wiki/Shell_Cottage" title="Shell Cottage">Shell Cottage</a>. Soon after Christmas, Ron used the <a href="/wiki/Deluminator" title="Deluminator">Deluminator</a> Dumbledore bequeathed him to locate his friends.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_11-15" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
