<figure class="thumb mw-halign-right show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/00/Locket_destruction.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140807061926" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Locket destruction" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="113" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Locket destruction.gif" data-image-key="Locket_destruction.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/00/Locket_destruction.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140807061926"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/00/Locket_destruction.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140807061926" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Locket destruction" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/00/Locket_destruction.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140807061926" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="113" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Locket destruction.gif" data-image-key="Locket_destruction.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/0/00/Locket_destruction.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140807061926"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Locket_destruction.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron returning to the hunt and destroying the <a href="/wiki/Slytherin%27s_Locket" title="Slytherin's Locket">locket</a> Horcrux</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Ron made his way to the <a href="/wiki/Forest_of_Dean" title="Forest of Dean">Forest of Dean</a>, where he arrived just in time to rescue Harry from drowning in a semi-frozen pond. When Ron attempted to use Godric Gryffindor's Sword to destroy the locket, horrible incorporeal images of Harry and Hermione came forth which cruelly mocked Ron about his many insecurities, including his fears that Hermione would choose Harry over him. This brought Ron to the point of tears. However, Ron, in far more rage than before, successfully stabbed the Horcrux with Godric Gryffindor's Sword.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_11-16" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Afterwards, Harry took Ron aside to assuage his fears about Harry and Hermione. Saving Harry's life earned Ron Harry's forgiveness, but Hermione — who was unaware of what the Horcrux had done — was still furious with him for his abandonment for some time and attacked him mercilessly upon sight until Harry cast a <a href="/wiki/Shield_Charm" title="Shield Charm">Shield Charm</a> to stop her.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_11-17" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Visit_to_the_Lovegood_House">Visit to the Lovegood House</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>Aha! That's got to be Luna's house, who else would live in a place like that? It looks like a giant rook!</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Ron describing the Lovegood's house<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>Upon his return, Ron was happy to the point of giddiness, because he thought that they had an ally out there somewhere. He sought to hide this happiness when around Hermione in an act of contrition. When Hermione proposed a trip to the Lovegood's house to investigate a recurring symbol, Ron wholeheartedly agreed. Harry privately accused Ron of only agreeing to get back on Hermione's good side, a fact that he did not deny stating, "<i>All's fair in love and war, and this is a bit of both.</i>"<sup id="cite_ref-DH_11-18" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/80/Xenophilius-Lovegood.png/revision/latest?cb=20141031144607" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Xenophilius-Lovegood" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="113" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Xenophilius-Lovegood.png" data-image-key="Xenophilius-Lovegood.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/80/Xenophilius-Lovegood.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141031144607"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/80/Xenophilius-Lovegood.png/revision/latest?cb=20141031144607" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Xenophilius-Lovegood" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/80/Xenophilius-Lovegood.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141031144607" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="113" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Xenophilius-Lovegood.png" data-image-key="Xenophilius-Lovegood.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/80/Xenophilius-Lovegood.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20141031144607"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Xenophilius-Lovegood.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio speaking with Xenophilius Lovegood at his home, near the village of <a href="/wiki/Ottery_St_Catchpole" title="Ottery St Catchpole">Ottery St Catchpole</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>The trio learned of the existence of the <a href="/wiki/Deathly_Hallows" title="Deathly Hallows">Deathly Hallows</a> from <a href="/wiki/Xenophilius_Lovegood" title="Xenophilius Lovegood">Xenophilius Lovegood</a>. Xenophilius, worried for his daughter <a href="/wiki/Luna_Lovegood" title="Luna Lovegood">Luna</a>, who was being held hostage by <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a>, tried to capture the trio. They narrowly escaped, Hermione engineering it in a way that preserved Ron's alibi of being sick at home. While Harry obsessed over the Hallows, Ron and Hermione thought they should focus on finding the Horcruxes, as Dumbledore had instructed them. During Harry's period of listless obsession, Ron's leadership qualities began to show. He suggested that they search many wizarding settlements for clues if only to be in motion and actively searching.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_11-19" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Skirmish_at_Malfoy_Manor">Skirmish at Malfoy Manor</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Bellatrix Lestrange</b>: "<i>All except... except for the Mudblood.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Ron</b>: "<i>No! You can have me, keep me!</i>"</dd>
<dd><b>Bellatrix Lestrange</b>: "<i>If she dies under questioning, I'll take you next. Blood traitor is next to Mudblood in my book. Take them downstairs, Greyback, and make sure they are secure, but do nothing more to them — yet.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Ron begging <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix</a> while in <a href="/wiki/Malfoy_Manor" title="Malfoy Manor">Malfoy Manor</a><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/62/Greyback_Hermione_and_Ron.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180115183807" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Greyback Hermione and Ron" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Greyback Hermione and Ron.jpg" data-image-key="Greyback_Hermione_and_Ron.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/62/Greyback_Hermione_and_Ron.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180115183807"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/62/Greyback_Hermione_and_Ron.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180115183807" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Greyback Hermione and Ron" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/62/Greyback_Hermione_and_Ron.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180115183807" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Greyback Hermione and Ron.jpg" data-image-key="Greyback_Hermione_and_Ron.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/62/Greyback_Hermione_and_Ron.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180115183807"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Greyback_Hermione_and_Ron.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron and Hermione held captive at the Malfoy Manor</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>During the Easter holidays of 1998, the trio was captured by a gang of <a href="/wiki/Snatchers" title="Snatchers">Snatchers</a> led by <a href="/wiki/Fenrir_Greyback" title="Fenrir Greyback">Fenrir Greyback</a> after Harry accidentally broke the <a href="/wiki/Taboo" title="Taboo">Taboo</a> on Voldemort's name. Hermione hit Harry in the face with a <a href="/wiki/Stinging_Jinx" title="Stinging Jinx">Stinging Hex</a> in order to disguise him. Harry, Hermione, and Ron quickly lied and gave fake names; Harry being Vernon Dudley, Hermione being <a href="/wiki/Penelope_Clearwater" title="Penelope Clearwater">Penelope Clearwater</a>, and Ron being Stan Shunpike. Ron was beaten (his mouth extremely bloody) and was then forced to use another name, Barny Weasley. This was due to the Snatchers already knowing who Stan Shunpike was. The Snatchers also found Godric Gryffindor's sword in their tent, there was no explaining that.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_11-20" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>They were then brought to Malfoy Manor, where Lucius Malfoy attempted to get his son to identify Harry. Draco said that he did not know whether it was Harry or not, but immediately recognised Ron and Hermione. The trio then meet with Bellatrix Lestrange, whom separated them. Ron tried to persuade Bellatrix to take him for questioning instead of Hermione. She responded that she would interrogate him next if Hermione died during questioning, as "<i>blood-traitor was next to mud-blood in her book</i>". Ron was forced into the dungeon with Harry, <a href="/wiki/Dean_Thomas" title="Dean Thomas">Dean Thomas</a>, and the goblin <a href="/wiki/Griphook" title="Griphook">Griphook</a>. In the dungeon they found Luna and Mr Ollivander, whom were captured in 1996.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_11-21" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e2/B7C23M1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161209020454" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B7C23M1" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B7C23M1.jpg" data-image-key="B7C23M1.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e2/B7C23M1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161209020454"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e2/B7C23M1.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20161209020454" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B7C23M1" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e2/B7C23M1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161209020454" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="98" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B7C23M1.jpg" data-image-key="B7C23M1.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e2/B7C23M1.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161209020454"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B7C23M1.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Dobby dropping the chandelier, allowing the prisoners time to escape</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Hermione was kept upstairs and tortured by Bellatrix, her screams reducing Ron to tears. The group was saved by <a href="/wiki/Dobby" title="Dobby">Dobby</a>, who was sent by <a href="/wiki/Aberforth_Dumbledore" title="Aberforth Dumbledore">Aberforth Dumbledore</a>. He freed Harry and Ron to run upstairs to save Hermione, who managed to lie under torture about where they had obtained <a href="/wiki/Sword_of_Gryffindor" title="Sword of Gryffindor">Gryffindor's Sword</a>. Ron disarmed Bellatrix after she avoided a chandelier dropped by Dobby, and pulled Hermione from the wreckage of the fallen chandelier, Disapparating them both to Bill and Fleur's home <a href="/wiki/Shell_Cottage" title="Shell Cottage">Shell Cottage</a>. They stayed there with Luna, Fleur, Bill, Mr Ollivander, and Griphook. He attended the burial of Dobby, where he humbly gave him his shoes and socks.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_11-22" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Gringotts_break-in">Gringotts break-in</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Travers</b>: "<i>Who is your friend? I do not recognise him.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Hermione Granger</b>: "<i>This is Dragomir Despard. He speaks very little English, but he is in sympathy with the Dark Lord's aims. He has travelled here from Transylvania to see our new regime.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— A disguised Hermione introducing a disguised Ron to Travers<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7b/Harry_Potter_approaching_Griphook_in_Shell_Cottage_DHF2.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180108172400" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry Potter approaching Griphook in Shell Cottage DHF2" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry Potter approaching Griphook in Shell Cottage DHF2.jpg" data-image-key="Harry_Potter_approaching_Griphook_in_Shell_Cottage_DHF2.jpg" data-relevant="1" 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7b/Harry_Potter_approaching_Griphook_in_Shell_Cottage_DHF2.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180108172400" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry Potter approaching Griphook in Shell Cottage DHF2" data-image-key="Harry_Potter_approaching_Griphook_in_Shell_Cottage_DHF2.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/7b/Harry_Potter_approaching_Griphook_in_Shell_Cottage_DHF2.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180108172400"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry_Potter_approaching_Griphook_in_Shell_Cottage_DHF2.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio speaking with Griphook about what lay within the Lestrange Vault at Gringotts</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>At the cottage Hermione recovered and she, Ron, and Harry planned to break into <a href="/wiki/Gringotts_Wizarding_Bank" title="Gringotts Wizarding Bank">Gringotts Wizarding Bank</a> in order to take <a href="/wiki/Hufflepuff%27s_Cup" title="Hufflepuff's Cup">Hufflepuff's Cup</a>, and a <a href="/wiki/Horcrux" title="Horcrux">Horcrux</a>, within the <a href="/wiki/Lestrange_Vault" title="Lestrange Vault">Lestrange Vault</a>. <a href="/wiki/Griphook" title="Griphook">Griphook</a> the goblin agreed to help them in exchange for Gryffindor's Sword. Ron, knowing that the sword was needed to destroy Horcruxes was reluctant to let Harry part with it. Harry suggested that they delay handing the sword over until the Horcruxes were destroyed. As the planning went forward, Ron, along with Harry and Hermione, found Griphook to be increasingly distasteful.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_11-23" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/31/Break-in_1998.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180310225013" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Break-in 1998" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="112" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Break-in 1998.jpg" data-image-key="Break-in_1998.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/31/Break-in_1998.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180310225013"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/31/Break-in_1998.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180310225013" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Break-in 1998" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/31/Break-in_1998.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180310225013" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="112" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Break-in 1998.jpg" data-image-key="Break-in_1998.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/31/Break-in_1998.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180310225013"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Break-in_1998.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron and Hermione, disguised as Dragomir Despard and <a href="/wiki/Bellatrix_Lestrange" title="Bellatrix Lestrange">Bellatrix Lestrange</a></p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>On the morning of 1 May 1998, they broke into Gringotts with Hermione disguised as Bellatrix Lestrange, Ron as a fictional foreign wizard named "Dragomir Despard", and Harry under his <a href="/wiki/Cloak_of_Invisibility" title="Cloak of Invisibility">Invisibility Cloak</a> with Griphook. As they were headed down into the vaults, the Gringotts defences (the <a href="/wiki/Thief%27s_Downfall" title="Thief's Downfall">Thief's Downfall</a> in particular) were set against them, and Ron's disguise melted away. Once in the vault, it was discovered that all the treasure had <a href="/wiki/Doubling_Charm" title="Doubling Charm">Geminio</a> and <a href="/wiki/Flagrante_Curse" title="Flagrante Curse">Flagrante</a> curses put on them. Although they were betrayed by Griphook, the trio obtained Helga Hufflepuff's cup and escaped the wizarding bank on the back of a dragon.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_11-24" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Battle_of_Hogwarts"><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Hogwarts" title="Battle of Hogwarts">Battle of Hogwarts</a></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">"<i>They can help. We don't know where it is. We've got to find it fast. We don't have to tell them it's a Horcrux.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Ron persuading Harry to let Dumbledore's Army help<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/Hogsmeade.jpeg/revision/latest?cb=20161206055316" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hogsmeade" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="164" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Hogsmeade.jpeg" data-image-key="Hogsmeade.jpeg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/Hogsmeade.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161206055316"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/Hogsmeade.jpeg/revision/latest?cb=20161206055316" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Hogsmeade" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/Hogsmeade.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161206055316" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="164" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Hogsmeade.jpeg" data-image-key="Hogsmeade.jpeg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4c/Hogsmeade.jpeg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20161206055316"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Hogsmeade.jpeg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio <a href="/wiki/Apparition" title="Apparition">Apparating</a> into Hogsmeade before the start of the final battle</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>After getting off the dragon escaping from the wizarding bank, Ron saw Harry having one of his visions. He was told that <a href="/wiki/Tom_Riddle" title="Tom Riddle">Lord Voldemort</a> finally knew that they were hunting Horcruxes and that the final one was at Hogwarts. Harry, Ron, and Hermione apparated under the <a href="/wiki/Cloak_of_Invisibility" title="Cloak of Invisibility">invisibility cloak</a> to Hogsmeade looking for a way into Hogwarts. They were soon cornered by <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> set to watch the town. Ron drew his wand ready to fight them, but Harry suggested that advantage lay in stealth and that attacking would give away their position. Once the Death Eaters ordered <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a> to search the town for the trio, Harry was forced to perform the Patronus Charm. After Harry's Patronus chased away the Dementors the trio found refuge in the <a href="/wiki/Hog%27s_Head_Inn" title="Hog's Head Inn">Hog's Head</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_11-25" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>A heated discussion with the proprietor followed, who turned out to be <a href="/wiki/Aberforth_Dumbledore" title="Aberforth Dumbledore">Aberforth Dumbledore</a>. The discussion revolved around Harry's mission and the seeming defeat of the Order of the Phoenix. After this they were lead into Hogwarts by a badly beaten <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a>, whom in Harry's absence became the de facto leader of the D.A. They arrived in the <a href="/wiki/Room_of_Requirement" title="Room of Requirement">Room of Requirement</a> and found that the reformed Dumbledore's Army was hiding out there. Harry whom had developed trust issues, did not like the idea of allowing the other DA members to help. Ron persuaded Harry to let the others do so anyway.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_11-26" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-6084.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180108173526" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-6084" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="107" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-6084.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-6084.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-6084.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180108173526"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-6084.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20180108173526" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-6084" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-6084.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180108173526" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="107" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-6084.jpg" data-image-key="Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-6084.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/8/82/Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-6084.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20180108173526"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Harry-potter7-movie-screencaps.com-6084.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione and Ron destroying the cup in the Chamber</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>While Harry searched for <a href="/wiki/Ravenclaw%27s_Diadem" title="Ravenclaw's Diadem">Ravenclaw's Diadem</a>, Ron and Hermione entered the <a href="/wiki/Chamber_of_Secrets" title="Chamber of Secrets">Chamber of Secrets</a> to retrieve basilisk fangs. Ron mimicked the <a href="/wiki/Parseltongue" title="Parseltongue">Parseltongue</a> he had heard Harry use to open Salazar Slytherin's locket and succeeded in gaining entrance to the Chamber. Hermione used the fangs to destroy the Horcrux of <a href="/wiki/Hufflepuff%27s_Cup" title="Hufflepuff's Cup">Hufflepuff's Cup</a>, and they then reunited with Harry. When Ron expressed desire to evacuate the <a href="/wiki/House-elf" title="House-elf">house-elves</a> from the Kitchens, Hermione, who had always been concerned for creatures so often mistreated by society, was so touched that she ran, nuzzled and kissed him, much to Ron's delight. However, their kiss was interrupted by Harry, who pointed out that there was a war going on and that they could carry on later, to which Ron pointed out there might not be later.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_11-27" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-right show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 245px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/ff/Ron_and_Hermione_fleeing_Fiendfyre_DHF2.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140308202617" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ron and Hermione fleeing Fiendfyre DHF2" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="104" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Ron and Hermione fleeing Fiendfyre DHF2.gif" data-image-key="Ron_and_Hermione_fleeing_Fiendfyre_DHF2.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/ff/Ron_and_Hermione_fleeing_Fiendfyre_DHF2.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140308202617"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/ff/Ron_and_Hermione_fleeing_Fiendfyre_DHF2.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140308202617" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ron and Hermione fleeing Fiendfyre DHF2" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/ff/Ron_and_Hermione_fleeing_Fiendfyre_DHF2.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140308202617" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="245" height="104" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Ron and Hermione fleeing Fiendfyre DHF2.gif" data-image-key="Ron_and_Hermione_fleeing_Fiendfyre_DHF2.gif" data-relevant="0" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/f/ff/Ron_and_Hermione_fleeing_Fiendfyre_DHF2.gif/revision/latest?cb=20140308202617"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Ron_and_Hermione_fleeing_Fiendfyre_DHF2.gif" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption"><a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione</a> and Ron running from the towering flames</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Harry, Ron, and Hermione entered the Room of Requirement to find Ravenclaw's diadem, but were ambushed by <a href="/wiki/Draco_Malfoy" title="Draco Malfoy">Malfoy</a>, <a href="/wiki/Vincent_Crabbe" title="Vincent Crabbe">Crabbe</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Gregory_Goyle" title="Gregory Goyle">Goyle</a>. When Crabbe unleashed a <a href="/wiki/Fiendfyre" title="Fiendfyre">cursed fire</a>, the trio escaped by means of broomsticks; Harry saved Draco, and Ron and Hermione saved Goyle. They then witnessed the death of Ron's brother Fred in combat, which devastated Ron, who wanted revenge. Hermione managed to calm him by reminding him that they would have to fight on their way to finding <a href="/wiki/Nagini" title="Nagini">Nagini</a>, Voldemort's final Horcrux. The trio made their way to the <a href="/wiki/Shrieking_Shack" title="Shrieking Shack">Shrieking Shack</a>, and witnessed the snake kill <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a> on Voldemort's orders. While dying, Severus Snape's memories leaked out of him, which Harry collected into a glass phial to latter view in the headmaster's office.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_11-28" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b0/B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png/revision/latest?cb=20150904231059" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B7C36M2 Voldemort vanquished" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="97" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B7C36M2 Voldemort vanquished.png" data-image-key="B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b0/B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150904231059"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b0/B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png/revision/latest?cb=20150904231059" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B7C36M2 Voldemort vanquished" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b0/B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150904231059" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="97" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B7C36M2 Voldemort vanquished.png" data-image-key="B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/b/b0/B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20150904231059"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B7C36M2_Voldemort_vanquished.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron witnessing Harry's final defeat of Lord Voldemort</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>During the pause in the Battle of Hogwarts, Ron went to the <a href="/wiki/Great_Hall" title="Great Hall">Great Hall</a>, where Bill comforted him over Fred's death and Hermione comforted Ginny. Harry went up to Dumbledore's office and emptied Snape's memories into the Pensieve. He entered the <a href="/wiki/Pensieve" title="Pensieve">Pensieve</a> and finally learned the truth of it all. After emerging from the Pensieve, he made use of the distraction to slip out and confront Voldemort. Following his alleged death, the battle resumed, and Ron and <a href="/wiki/Neville_Longbottom" title="Neville Longbottom">Neville Longbottom</a> brought <a href="/wiki/Fenrir_Greyback" title="Fenrir Greyback">Fenrir Greyback</a> down together. Ron witnessed Harry defeat Lord Voldemort once and for all, and survived the battle without serious injury.<sup id="cite_ref-DH_11-29" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DH-11"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>11<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h3><span id="After_Hogwarts_.281998.E2.80.932014.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="After_Hogwarts_(1998–2014)">After Hogwarts <span class="template-c">(1998–2014)</span></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Accio Quote!">"<i>Harry and Ron utterly revolutionised the Auror Department in — at the Ministry of Magic. So they — I mean, they are now the consummate — they are experts... And by the time — 19 years later — I would imagine that Harry is heading up that department, which is not corrupt in any way. </i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— <a href="/wiki/J._K._Rowling" title="J. K. Rowling">J. K. Rowling</a> regarding Harry's career after the war<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Accio_Quote!" title="Accio Quote!">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-right show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 200px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5d/HogwartsHeroesJoinMinistry.png/revision/latest?cb=20190610210829" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="HogwartsHeroesJoinMinistry" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="200" height="269" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="HogwartsHeroesJoinMinistry.png" data-image-key="HogwartsHeroesJoinMinistry.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5d/HogwartsHeroesJoinMinistry.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20190610210829"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5d/HogwartsHeroesJoinMinistry.png/revision/latest?cb=20190610210829" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="HogwartsHeroesJoinMinistry" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5d/HogwartsHeroesJoinMinistry.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20190610210829" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="200" height="269" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="HogwartsHeroesJoinMinistry.png" data-image-key="HogwartsHeroesJoinMinistry.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5d/HogwartsHeroesJoinMinistry.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20190610210829"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:HogwartsHeroesJoinMinistry.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The trio joining the Ministry, creating a new world</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Ron never received a seventh year of education at Hogwarts. Instead of completing his education, he moved on to become an <a href="/wiki/Auror" title="Auror">Auror</a> (along with Harry) at the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">Ministry of Magic</a>, where he helped track down and capture those of Lord Voldemort's supporters that had gone into hiding, or else feigned innocence or ignorance whilst having actually cooperated and willingly supported his regime.<sup id="cite_ref-PotterCast_31-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PotterCast-31"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>31<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Two years after he started at the Auror Office, he left to help his brother <a href="/wiki/George_Weasley" title="George Weasley">George</a> at <a href="/wiki/Weasleys%27_Wizard_Wheezes" title="Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes">Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes</a> in <a href="/wiki/Diagon_Alley" title="Diagon Alley">Diagon Alley</a>, although he retained strong ties in the Ministry, and their work revolutionised both the Auror department and the institution at large, and along with Hermione, the trio helped <i>"make a new world</i>" for the wizarding community.<sup id="cite_ref-42" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-42"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>42<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>His decision to step down was questioned by <a href="/wiki/Rita_Skeeter" title="Rita Skeeter">Rita Skeeter</a>, who thought that Ron was tired of standing in Harry's shadow, and wrote in her gossip column that Ron was likely mentally ill (this must, of course, be taken with more than a small pinch of salt due to Rita's habit of writing scathing lies in articles), having said himself that the <a href="/wiki/Albus_Dumbledore_and_Harry_Potter%27s_Horcrux_Hunt" class="mw-redirect" title="Albus Dumbledore and Harry Potter's Horcrux Hunt">Horcrux hunt</a> had "<i>took its toll</i>" on him.<sup id="cite_ref-PM-QWC_28-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PM-QWC-28"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>28<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>During the <a href="/wiki/Trial_of_Dolores_Umbridge" title="Trial of Dolores Umbridge">trial</a> of <a href="/wiki/Dolores_Umbridge" title="Dolores Umbridge">Dolores Umbridge</a> shortly after the war, Umbridge managed to escape and ally with some <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a> (<a href="/wiki/Corban_Yaxley" title="Corban Yaxley">Corban Yaxley</a>, the <a href="/wiki/Carrow_family" title="Carrow family">Carrows</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Walden_Macnair" title="Walden Macnair">Walden Macnair</a>). Together, they planned a plot involving <a href="/wiki/Time-Turner" title="Time-Turner">Time-Turners</a> to bring back the <a href="/wiki/Fall_of_the_British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="Fall of the British Ministry of Magic">dictatorship</a> that had existed in the <a href="/wiki/British_Ministry_of_Magic" title="British Ministry of Magic">British Ministry of Magic</a> from <a href="/wiki/1997" title="1997">1997</a>–<a href="/wiki/1998" title="1998">1998</a>. They were stopped, however, by Ron Weasley, <a href="/wiki/Hermione_Granger" title="Hermione Granger">Hermione Granger</a> and Harry Potter.<sup id="cite_ref-WWHP_43-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WWHP-43"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>43<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/67/Trio_epilouge.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160905173347" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Trio epilouge" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="118" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Trio epilouge.jpg" data-image-key="Trio_epilouge.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/67/Trio_epilouge.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160905173347"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/67/Trio_epilouge.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160905173347" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Trio epilouge" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/67/Trio_epilouge.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160905173347" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="118" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Trio epilouge.jpg" data-image-key="Trio_epilouge.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/6/67/Trio_epilouge.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160905173347"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Trio_epilouge.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry, Ron, and Hermione as adults after the war</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Sometime between <a href="/wiki/1998" title="1998">1998</a> and <a href="/wiki/2006" title="2006">2006</a>, Ron married Hermione, and later the couple had two children: <a href="/wiki/Rose_Granger-Weasley" title="Rose Granger-Weasley">Rose</a> and <a href="/wiki/Hugo_Granger-Weasley" title="Hugo Granger-Weasley">Hugo</a>. Ron was also the godfather and uncle of Harry and Ginny's oldest son. At some point, Ron, Harry, and Hermione were all featured on <a href="/wiki/Chocolate_Frog_Card" title="Chocolate Frog Card">Chocolate Frog Cards</a> for their accomplishments, which Ron considered his "<i>finest hour</i>".<sup id="cite_ref-CFC_44-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-CFC-44"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>44<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Ron himself noted that he and Hermione were quite young when they were married and that he became rather drunk afterward, having very little memory of the night after the ceremony.<sup id="cite_ref-45" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-45"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>45<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-right show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2c/Conversation_at_Deathday_Party_MA.png/revision/latest?cb=20220619070947" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Conversation at Deathday Party MA" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="118" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Conversation at Deathday Party MA.png" data-image-key="Conversation_at_Deathday_Party_MA.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2c/Conversation_at_Deathday_Party_MA.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20220619070947"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2c/Conversation_at_Deathday_Party_MA.png/revision/latest?cb=20220619070947" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Conversation at Deathday Party MA" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2c/Conversation_at_Deathday_Party_MA.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20220619070947" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="118" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Conversation at Deathday Party MA.png" data-image-key="Conversation_at_Deathday_Party_MA.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/2/2c/Conversation_at_Deathday_Party_MA.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20220619070947"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Conversation_at_Deathday_Party_MA.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron stopping by at the Deathday Party</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>On <a href="/wiki/31_October" title="31 October">31 October</a> <a href="/wiki/2009" title="2009">2009</a>, Ron came back to Hogwarts to bring his <a href="/wiki/Deluminator" title="Deluminator">Deluminator</a> to <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Headmistress McGonagall</a> so she could take another look at it. On the way there, he travelled past <a href="/wiki/London" title="London">London</a> and used the Deluminator to collect the lights of half a street. When he arrived, he happened to be attracted to <a href="/wiki/Nicholas_de_Mimsy-Porpington" title="Nicholas de Mimsy-Porpington">Nicholas de Mimsy-Porpington</a>'s <a href="/wiki/Nicholas_de_Mimsy-Porpington%27s_five-hundred_and_seventeenth_Deathday_Party" title="Nicholas de Mimsy-Porpington's five-hundred and seventeenth Deathday Party">Deathday Party</a>, where he talked to an <a href="/wiki/Tiburon_Merriweather%27s_great-grandchild" title="Tiburon Merriweather's great-grandchild">unidentified student</a> and showed them the Deluminator. When <a href="/wiki/Peeves" title="Peeves">Peeves</a> caused the lights in the party hall to go out, Ron encouraged the student to use the Deluminator to restore the lights.<sup id="cite_ref-MA_46-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-MA-46"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>46<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Seeing the <a href="/wiki/Ghost" title="Ghost">ghosts</a> at the party also inspired Ron to develop with George a banquet platter that looked and smelled bad (which might be appealing to ghosts) but tasted fresh when taken off of the plates. Several days later, he met the unidentified student again at Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes, and they talked about the ghosts as well as the unfinished banquet platter.<sup id="cite_ref-MA_WWW1_47-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-MA_WWW1-47"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>47<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e4/Wizards_and_witches_at_the_end_of_the_Siege_of_Hogwarts_MA.png/revision/latest?cb=20221119092214" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Wizards and witches at the end of the Siege of Hogwarts MA" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="101" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Wizards and witches at the end of the Siege of Hogwarts MA.png" data-image-key="Wizards_and_witches_at_the_end_of_the_Siege_of_Hogwarts_MA.png" data-relevant="1" xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron with others at the end of the battle</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>During the <a href="/wiki/2010%E2%80%932011_school_year" title="2010–2011 school year">2010–2011 school year</a>, Ron came back again to his alma mater to join the defence force against <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a> and other <a href="/wiki/Dark_Arts" title="Dark Arts">Dark</a> creatures when they attempted to attack the <a href="/wiki/Hogwarts_Castle" title="Hogwarts Castle">castle</a>. He was seen putting up and reinforcing the spherical shield around the castle with students and staff, and he also participated in the <a href="/wiki/Siege_of_Hogwarts" title="Siege of Hogwarts">big battle</a> that ended the attacks. He discussed with Harry, Hermione and the staff about the cause of the attacks afterwards, and when Harry said he had an idea, Ron guessed that he meant the <a href="/wiki/Death_Eaters" title="Death Eaters">Death Eaters</a>, though it was not what Harry had in mind.<sup id="cite_ref-MA_Dawn_48-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-MA_Dawn-48"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>48<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>

href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/71/Player_and_Ron_at_Weasleys%27_Wizard_Wheezes_MA.png/revision/latest?cb=20230301132953" class="mw-file-description image"><img data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/7/71/Player_and_Ron_at_Weasleys%27_Wizard_Wheezes_MA.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20230301132953"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Player_and_Ron_at_Weasleys%27_Wizard_Wheezes_MA.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">The student and Ron at Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Ron was looking after Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes one day when the unidentified student visited again, and he introduced several products to them such as the <a href="/wiki/Weasleys%27_Wildfire_Whiz-bangs" title="Weasleys' Wildfire Whiz-bangs">Wildfire Whiz-bangs</a>, <a href="/wiki/Trick_wand" title="Trick wand">trick wands</a> and <a href="/wiki/Skiving_Snackbox" title="Skiving Snackbox">Skiving Snackboxes</a> and told stories about them. For the last one, he showed them the <a href="/wiki/Canary_Cream" title="Canary Cream">Canary Cream</a>, and they both ate it and briefly turned into <a href="/wiki/Canary" title="Canary">canaries</a>. The student asked if there were other flavours of it, and Ron took it to be a good advice to develop more flavours to mix into other food or tempt others into eating, joking that he would eat a <a href="/wiki/Chicken_(food)" title="Chicken (food)">drumstick</a>-flavoured <a href="/wiki/Biscuit" title="Biscuit">biscuit</a> at once.<sup id="cite_ref-MA_WWW2_49-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-MA_WWW2-49"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>49<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/34/George%2C_Ron_and_player_at_Zonko%27s_MA.png/revision/latest?cb=20230406111655" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="George, Ron and player at Zonko's MA" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="122" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="George, Ron and player at Zonko's MA.png" data-image-key="George%2C_Ron_and_player_at_Zonko%27s_MA.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/34/George%2C_Ron_and_player_at_Zonko%27s_MA.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20230406111655"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/34/George%2C_Ron_and_player_at_Zonko%27s_MA.png/revision/latest?cb=20230406111655" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="George, Ron and player at Zonko's MA" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/34/George%2C_Ron_and_player_at_Zonko%27s_MA.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20230406111655" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="122" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="George, Ron and player at Zonko's MA.png" data-image-key="George%2C_Ron_and_player_at_Zonko%27s_MA.png" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/3/34/George%2C_Ron_and_player_at_Zonko%27s_MA.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20230406111655"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:George,_Ron_and_player_at_Zonko%27s_MA.png" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">George, Ron and the student at Zonko's</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Another time, Ron and George followed the student into <a href="/wiki/Zonko%27s_Joke_Shop" title="Zonko's Joke Shop">Zonko's Joke Shop</a> while debating about whether old joke products could still become a big sale. The student recognised them, and Ron argued that products like <a href="/wiki/Dungbomb" title="Dungbomb">Dungbombs</a> were classics for a reason, and if Zonko's was able to sell them well, so could they. George demanded evidence from him, and the student suggested they learn from their customers about their preferences. The brothers then started a fight that involved different kinds of pranks to determine what people liked more.<sup id="cite_ref-MA_AprilFools1_50-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-MA_AprilFools1-50"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>50<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> After George invited Harry with selling the products, Ron became upset and invited Hermione, who was unable to decline.<sup id="cite_ref-MA_AprilFools2_51-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-MA_AprilFools2-51"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>51<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> At the end, George asked Ron to summarise the results of the questionnaires, but neither of them kept record. Ron wondered how they could know the winner, and felt it would be better if <a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley" title="Fred Weasley">Fred</a> was there, who he believed was more thoughtful and quick to action, though George reckoned both of them were better at those than Ron. They reminisced about Fred, and were joined by the student's friends.<sup id="cite_ref-MA_AprilFools3_52-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-MA_AprilFools3-52"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>52<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h3><span id="Later_life_.282014.E2.80.93.29"></span><span class="mw-headline" id="Later_life_(2014–)">Later life <span class="template-c">(2014–)</span></span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h3>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Pottermore">"<i>In the immediate aftermath of the battle Weasley, whose famous ginger hair appears to be thinning slightly, entered into employment with the Ministry of Magic alongside Potter, but left only two years later to co-manage the highly successful wizarding joke emporium Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes. Was he, as he stated at the time, 'delighted to assist my brother George with a business I've always loved'? Or had he had his fill of standing in Potter's shadow? Was the work of the Auror Department too much for a man who has admitted that the destruction of He Who Could Not Be Named's Horcruxes 'took its toll' on him? He shows no obvious signs of mental illness from a distance, but the public is not allowed close enough to make a proper assessment. Is this suspicious?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— <i><a href="/wiki/DUMBLEDORE%27S_ARMY_REUNITES_AT_QUIDDITCH_WORLD_CUP_FINAL" title="DUMBLEDORE'S ARMY REUNITES AT QUIDDITCH WORLD CUP FINAL">DUMBLEDORE'S ARMY REUNITES AT QUIDDITCH WORLD CUP FINAL</a></i><sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Pottermore" title="Pottermore">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="2014_Quidditch_World_Cup">2014 Quidditch World Cup</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p>Ron, Hermione and their children Rose and Hugo all attended the final of the <a href="/wiki/2014_Quidditch_World_Cup" title="2014 Quidditch World Cup">427th Quidditch World Cup</a> in the <a href="/wiki/Patagonian_Desert" title="Patagonian Desert">Patagonian Desert</a> in July 2014, alongside Harry, Ginny, James, Albus, <a href="/wiki/Edward_Lupin" title="Edward Lupin">Teddy Lupin</a>, Neville, Hannah, Luna, Rolf, Bill, Fleur, Victoire, and potentially others.<sup id="cite_ref-PM-QWC_28-2" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PM-QWC-28"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>28<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> Ron also became close with Harry's children, one of whom, James, was his godson. Lily Luna Potter and Ron's son were close in age and good friends, as were Ron's daughter and Albus Severus Potter.<sup class="noprint">[<a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Citing_sources" class="extiw" title="wikipedia:Wikipedia:Citing sources"><i><span title="The material in the vicinity of this tag needs references to reliable sources." style="white-space: nowrap;">citation needed</span></i></a>]</sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Seeing_off_his_daughter">Seeing off his daughter</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows"><b>Albus Potter</b>: "<i>Why are they all </i>staring<i>?</i>"</span></dd>
<dd><b>Ron</b>: "<i>Don't let it worry you. It's me. I'm extremely famous.</i>"</dd>
<dd>— Ron talking about the reason of people staring<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Deathly_Hallows" title="Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows">[src]</a></sup></dd></dl>
</div>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/d/d9/Granger-Weasley_family_on_Platform_9%C2%BE_DHF2.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140813031055" class="mw-file-description image"><img 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Granger-Weasley_family_on_Platform_9%C2%BE_DHF2.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron seeing his daughter off to <a href="/wiki/Platform_Nine_and_Three-Quarters" title="Platform Nine and Three-Quarters">platform 9¾</a> in 2017</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>In August of <a href="/wiki/2017" title="2017">2017</a>, Ron, having settled into a rotund middle age, obtained a Muggle <a href="/wiki/Driving_test" title="Driving test">driving licence</a>. He also admitted putting a <a href="/wiki/Confundus_Charm" title="Confundus Charm">Confundus Charm</a> on the Muggle driving inspector because he had forgotten to use his wing mirror properly, excusing this mistake because casting a <a href="/wiki/Supersensory_Charm" title="Supersensory Charm">Supersensory Charm</a> would be more effective. That year, he and Hermione sent their daughter off for her first year at Hogwarts, and Ron encouraged Rose to be Sorted into <a href="/wiki/Gryffindor" title="Gryffindor">Gryffindor House</a> and to beat <a href="/wiki/Scorpius_Malfoy" title="Scorpius Malfoy">Scorpius Malfoy</a> in marks. He hugged Hugo gently.<sup id="cite_ref-DHE_53-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DHE-53"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>53<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/45/B7_Pottermore_Epilogue_Colour_01.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160809220442" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B7 Pottermore Epilogue Colour 01" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="114" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="B7 Pottermore Epilogue Colour 01.jpg" data-image-key="B7_Pottermore_Epilogue_Colour_01.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/45/B7_Pottermore_Epilogue_Colour_01.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160809220442"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/45/B7_Pottermore_Epilogue_Colour_01.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160809220442" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="B7 Pottermore Epilogue Colour 01" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/45/B7_Pottermore_Epilogue_Colour_01.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160809220442" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="114" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="B7 Pottermore Epilogue Colour 01.jpg" data-image-key="B7_Pottermore_Epilogue_Colour_01.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/45/B7_Pottermore_Epilogue_Colour_01.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160809220442"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:B7_Pottermore_Epilogue_Colour_01.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">A 37-year-old Ron with his family</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>As the train faded away, Ron remembered his time at Hogwarts and how he would love to be going back. At a gathering with Hermione, Harry and Ginny, they talked about the meeting and Ron attempted to cheer everyone up by making jokes which led them them telling him to stop. Before the start of the new school year, Ron and Hermione told Rose to try and befriend Albus again since they have drifted apart since starting Hogwarts.<sup id="cite_ref-DHE_53-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-DHE-53"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>53<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="Fighting_Delphini">Fighting Delphini</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<p>A while later, Ron attended a meeting at the Ministry of Magic. Hermione was worried about how Harry was having nightmares and his scar was hurting again. Ron got into an argument with Draco Malfoy.
</p>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e1/Ron_Hermione_cursed_child.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160802193002" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ron Hermione cursed child" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="132" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Ron Hermione cursed child.jpg" data-image-key="Ron_Hermione_cursed_child.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e1/Ron_Hermione_cursed_child.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160802193002"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e1/Ron_Hermione_cursed_child.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160802193002" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ron Hermione cursed child" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e1/Ron_Hermione_cursed_child.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160802193002" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="132" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Ron Hermione cursed child.jpg" data-image-key="Ron_Hermione_cursed_child.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/e/e1/Ron_Hermione_cursed_child.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160802193002"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Ron_Hermione_cursed_child.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Hermione and Ron standing in her office at the Ministry of Magic</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>When Albus and Scorpius meddled with time, they changed Ron's life. In one <a href="/wiki/Alternate_reality" title="Alternate reality">alternate reality</a>, Ron helped Harry and Ginny find Albus. Ron never married Hermione and instead married Padma Patil. In another alternate reality where Voldemort won, Ron was in hiding with Hermione as a member of what remained of <a href="/wiki/Dumbledore%27s_Army" title="Dumbledore's Army">Dumbledore's Army</a>. They were visited by <a href="/wiki/Severus_Snape" title="Severus Snape">Severus Snape</a> and Scorpius who told them about the original timeline where they won. Ron agreed to help correct time by time-travelling to the moments where Albus and Scorpius changed time and use a <a href="/wiki/Shield_Charm" title="Shield Charm">Shield Charm</a> to stop them.
</p><p>However, when they stopped them the first time, they returned to a present that hadn't changed much. They were attacked by <a href="/wiki/Dementor" title="Dementor">Dementors</a> and Ron and Hermione sacrifice their souls after professing their love for each other to give Scorpius time to escape. Their sacrifice, combined with Snape's a short time later, allowed Scorpius to return to the Second Task and set things right completely.
</p><p>When the original timeline was restored, Ron was asked to attend a meeting with <a href="/wiki/Minerva_McGonagall" title="Minerva McGonagall">Professor McGonagall</a> to talk about what happened. He turned up late having somehow ended up in the kitchens instead. Ron, Hermione, Harry, Ginny and Draco were very forgiving of Albus and Scorpius so McGonagall reminded them of the great dangers of what they had done.
</p>
<figure class="thumb mw-halign-left show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 250px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4e/Potterplay.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160802231655" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Potterplay" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="134" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Potterplay.jpg" data-image-key="Potterplay.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4e/Potterplay.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160802231655"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4e/Potterplay.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160802231655" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Potterplay" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4e/Potterplay.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160802231655" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="250" height="134" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Potterplay.jpg" data-image-key="Potterplay.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/4e/Potterplay.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/250?cb=20160802231655"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Potterplay.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Harry, Ron, Draco, and others travelling back in time to assist Albus and Scorpius</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Albus and Scorpius were kidnapped by <a href="/wiki/Delphini" title="Delphini">Delphi</a> and made to time-travel to 31 October, 1981. Ron went with Hermione, Harry, Ginny, and Draco to the past to save them and stop Delphi. However, under Ginny's prodding, they realised that Delphi did not to want to kill baby Harry, but rather to stop Voldemort from doing so in the hope he would live and his reign would continue. Delphi thought she could make her father stronger as he would know love when he met her, which its lacking was what had originally led to his downfall. Ron helped Harry duel Delphi and they apprehended her. Ron then returned to the present where Delphi was sent to <a href="/wiki/Azkaban" title="Azkaban">Azkaban</a>.
</p>
<h4><span class="mw-headline" id="The_Calamity">The Calamity</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h4>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter: Wizards Unite">"<i>Ron's abductor must have used <a href="/wiki/Polyjuice_Potion" title="Polyjuice Potion">Polyjuice Potion</a> to impersonate me, just like Ginny's attempted abductor took on the appearance of her Editor—in—Chief.</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Hermione Granger regarding Ron's abduction and Ginny's near abduction<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter:_Wizards_Unite" title="Harry Potter: Wizards Unite">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<table class="notice metadata made-dark" cellpadding="3px" style="text-align: center; background: snow; border: #a00 1px solid; margin: 1em 10% 1em 10%;">

<tbody><tr>
<td><figure class="mw-halign-left" typeof="mw:File"><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5b/Engorgio.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20200412235655" class="mw-file-description image"><img src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="100" height="79" class="mw-file-element lazyload" data-image-name="Engorgio.jpg" data-image-key="Engorgio.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/5/5b/Engorgio.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/100?cb=20200412235655"></a><figcaption></figcaption></figure>
</td>
<td><i><b>'Engorgio!'</b></i>
<p>It is requested that this article, or a section of this article, should be <b>expanded</b>. Please help the <a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_Wiki:About" title="Harry Potter Wiki:About">Harry Potter Wiki</a> by expanding this article to give more complete coverage of its subject.
</p>
</td></tr></tbody></table>
<p>During the <a href="/wiki/Calamity" title="Calamity">Calamity</a>, Ron would assist the members of the <a href="/wiki/Statute_of_Secrecy_Task_Force" title="Statute of Secrecy Task Force">Statute of Secrecy Task Force</a> who pursued a Professor profession when he ran into them in the Leaky Cauldron by debating on defensive footwork during duelling, causing them to gain increased resilience. <a href="/wiki/Constance_Pickering" title="Constance Pickering">Constance Pickering</a> also talked Ron into hosting an informal lesson on evading enemy attacks for Task Force members who pursued an <a href="/wiki/Auror" title="Auror">Auror</a> profession, highlighting the advantages of supplementing defensive spells with evasive manoeuvres, such as side-steps and rolls.<sup id="cite_ref-WU_54-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WU-54"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>54<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>Ron later visited a pub with a <a href="/wiki/Calamity_Investigator" title="Calamity Investigator">Calamity Investigator</a> working for the Task Force. The bartender, pleased that the Calamity Investigator had brought a "celebrity" into his pub, pulled them aside and gave them a secret phrase they could use to order off-the-menu pints and other items. Ron later oversaw a <a href="/wiki/Wizard%27s_Chess" title="Wizard's Chess">Wizard's Chess</a> tournament attended by the same Calamity Investigator. Ron's commentary at the event was described as "boisterous and colourful," allowing the Calamity Investigator to learn how to better focus on strategy despite considerable distraction.<sup id="cite_ref-WU_54-1" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WU-54"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>54<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>In the spring of <a href="/wiki/2021" title="2021">2021</a>, <a href="/wiki/The_Unforgivable" title="The Unforgivable">The Unforgivable</a> threatened Harry and Hermione after the two began wrenching control of Calamity surges away from the cabal. The two feared that their children would be targeted, but Harry insisted on continuing to fight against the Unforgivable. Harry redirected a Calamity surge and controlled it using memories of the <a href="/wiki/Marauders" title="Marauders">Marauders</a>. By <a href="/wiki/April" title="April">April</a>, Ginny had been attacked and Ronald had been abducted.<sup id="cite_ref-WU_Marauders2_55-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-WU_Marauders2-55"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>55<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Physical_description">Physical description</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<figure class="thumb  show-info-icon" typeof="mw:File/Thumb" style="width: 200px"> 	<a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/46/Ron-Weasley-harry-potter-and-the-deathly-hallows-movies-17179892-1919-2560.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140602175711" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ron-Weasley-harry-potter-and-the-deathly-hallows-movies-17179892-1919-2560" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAEALAAAAAABAAEAQAICTAEAOw%3D%3D" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="200" height="267" class="thumbimage lazyload" data-image-name="Ron-Weasley-harry-potter-and-the-deathly-hallows-movies-17179892-1919-2560.jpg" data-image-key="Ron-Weasley-harry-potter-and-the-deathly-hallows-movies-17179892-1919-2560.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/46/Ron-Weasley-harry-potter-and-the-deathly-hallows-movies-17179892-1919-2560.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20140602175711"></a> 	<noscript><a href="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/46/Ron-Weasley-harry-potter-and-the-deathly-hallows-movies-17179892-1919-2560.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20140602175711" class="mw-file-description image"><img alt="Ron-Weasley-harry-potter-and-the-deathly-hallows-movies-17179892-1919-2560" src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/46/Ron-Weasley-harry-potter-and-the-deathly-hallows-movies-17179892-1919-2560.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20140602175711" decoding="async" loading="lazy" width="200" height="267" class="thumbimage" data-image-name="Ron-Weasley-harry-potter-and-the-deathly-hallows-movies-17179892-1919-2560.jpg" data-image-key="Ron-Weasley-harry-potter-and-the-deathly-hallows-movies-17179892-1919-2560.jpg" data-relevant="1" data-src="https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/harrypotter/images/4/46/Ron-Weasley-harry-potter-and-the-deathly-hallows-movies-17179892-1919-2560.jpg/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/200?cb=20140602175711"></a></noscript> 	<figcaption class="thumbcaption"> 		 			<a href="/wiki/File:Ron-Weasley-harry-potter-and-the-deathly-hallows-movies-17179892-1919-2560.jpg" class="info-icon"><svg><use xlink:href="#wds-icons-info-small"></use></svg></a> 		 		 		 			<p class="caption">Ron at age 17</p> 		 	</figcaption> </figure>
<p>Ron inherited the typical <a href="/wiki/Weasley_family" title="Weasley family">Weasley family</a> traits: fiery red hair and a freckled complexion. When he became embarrassed, his ears notably turned red. He had blue eyes, a long nose, and was described as being very tall and lanky, with big hands and feet.<sup id="cite_ref-PS_12-8" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PS-12"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>12<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> In this way, his stature was similar to those of his older brothers <a href="/wiki/William_Weasley" title="William Weasley">Bill</a> and <a href="/wiki/Percy_Weasley" title="Percy Weasley">Percy</a>, rather than the heavily built <a href="/wiki/Charles_Weasley" title="Charles Weasley">Charlie</a>, and <a href="/wiki/Fred_Weasley" title="Fred Weasley">Fred</a> and <a href="/wiki/George_Weasley" title="George Weasley">George</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-HPLE_1-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HPLE-1"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>1<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>His sister <a href="/wiki/Ginevra_Weasley" title="Ginevra Weasley">Ginny</a> once joked to the trio that Ron had a <a href="/wiki/Pygmy_Puff" title="Pygmy Puff">Pygmy Puff</a> <a href="/wiki/Tattoo" title="Tattoo">tattoo</a>,<sup id="cite_ref-HBP_8-8" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-HBP-8"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>8<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> though it is doubtful that the remark had any truth in it.
</p><p>By <a href="/wiki/2014" title="2014">2014</a>, when he was at the age of 34, <a href="/wiki/Rita_Skeeter" title="Rita Skeeter">Rita Skeeter</a> remarked on a <i><a href="/wiki/Daily_Prophet" title="Daily Prophet">Daily Prophet</a></i> gossip column that his "<i>famous ginger hair appears to be thinning slightly</i>".<sup id="cite_ref-PM-QWC_28-3" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-PM-QWC-28"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>28<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>By <a href="/wiki/2017" title="2017">2017</a>, Ron had settled into a round middle age<sup id="cite_ref-56" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-56"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>56<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> and was later described to be getting "a bit of a gut" by his nephew, yet hiding it extremely well.<sup id="cite_ref-57" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-57"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>57<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p><p>He had scars from the brains which attacked him in the Thought Room in the <a href="/wiki/Battle_of_the_Department_of_Mysteries" title="Battle of the Department of Mysteries">Battle of the Department of Mysteries</a>.<sup id="cite_ref-OOTP38_58-0" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-OOTP38-58"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>58<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup>
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Personality_and_traits">Personality and traits</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">]</span></span></h2>
<div class="quote">
<dl><dd><span title="Source: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">"<i>...Ron's got all those brothers to compete against at home and you're his best friend, and you're really famous — he's always shunted to one side whenever people see you, and he puts up with you and he never mentions it...</i>"</span></dd>
<dd>— Description of Ron's loyalty, despite his insecurities<sup class="noprint"><a href="/wiki/Harry_Potter_and_the_Goblet_of_Fire" title="Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire">[src]</a></sup></dd>
<dd></dd></dl></div>
<p>Ron was a very loyal, brave, strong and humourous person, but sometimes immature, and insensitive.<sup id="cite_ref-59" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-59"><span class="cite-bracket">[</span>59<span class="cite-bracket">]</span></a></sup> He had a sardonic, wisecracking sense of humour that often brought his friends laughter and relaxation.
